Gedor, Akio, Jeker,
ki Miklot, ma en aye won Cimea. Jo magi bene kacel ki lukakagi yam gubedo ma gukemme ki lukakagi ma gibedo i Jerucalem.
Ner onywalo Kic. Kic onywalo Caulo, Caulo onywalo Yonacan, Malkicua, Abinadab, ki Ecibaal.
Yonacan onywalo Meribaal, Meribaal onywalo Mika.
Litino awobe pa Mika aye Piton, Melek, Tarea ki Akaj:
Akaj onywalo Yekoada, Yekoada onywalo Alemet, Ajimavet ki Jimri. Jimri onywalo Moja,
Moja onywalo Binea ma wode Rapa, ma wode Eleaca, ma wode Ajel.
Ajel yam tye ki litino awobe abicel ma nyiŋgi ene: Ajrikam, Bokeru, Icmael, Cearia, Obadia ki Kanan. Jo magi ducu aye litino awobe pa Ajel.
Litino awobe pa ominne Ecek gin ene: Ulam ma latin kayone, me aryone Jeuc, me adekke Elipelet.
Litino awobe pa Ulam yam gin twoni oteka lweny, wegi atum, ma litino awobegi ki likwayogi pol mada, gin ducu miya acel ki pyerabic. Jo magi ducu gin jo pa Benjamin.
Yam gicoyo nyiŋ jo Icrael ducu i buk me tekwarogi, ma gicoyogi i buk pa Luker me Icrael. Jo Juda yam giterogi i opii i Babilon pien onoŋo guŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa.
Jo ma gukwono dwogo cen ka bedo i dul lobo ma yam gimiyo botgi i gaŋigi gin aye jo Icrael kacel ki ajwagi pa Lubaŋa, Lulevi, ki lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Jo mogo me kaka pa Juda, Benjamin, Epraim ki Manace gucako bedo i Jerucalem.
Gin aye Utai wod pa Amikud, ma wod pa Omri, wod pa Imri, wod pa Bani ki i kin likwayo pa Perej ma wod pa Juda.
Dok i kin likwayo pa Cela, Acaya ma latin kayo ki litino awobene.
Ki i kin likwayo pa Jera, Jeuel ki lukakagi, gin miya abicel ki pyeraboŋwen noŋo.
Ki i kin jo Benjamin Calu ma wod pa Meculam, wod pa Kodavia, wod pa Kacenua.
Ibneya wod pa Jerokam, Ela wod pa Uji ma wod pa Mikri, ki Meculam wod pa Cepatia ma wod pa Reuel, wod pa Ibinija,
kacel ki lukakagi ma lubo yalwakgi, dano miya aboŋwen ki pyerabic wiye abicel. Gin ducu ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi.
Ajwagi pa Lubaŋa ma gudwogo cen ma gubedo i Jerucalem gin aye Jedaya, Jekoyarib, Jakin
ki Ajaria wod pa Ilkia ma wod pa Meculam, wod pa Jadok, wod pa Merayot, wod pa Akitub, ma en aye ladit ma loyo ot pa Lubaŋa;
ki Adaya wod pa Jerokam ma wod pa Packur, wod pa Malkija; ki Maacai wod pa Adiel ma wod pa Jakajera, wod pa Meculam, wod pa Mecilemit, wod pa Imer;
kacel ki lukakagi bene ma gin tudito kaka i odi pa kwarogi, gin dano alip acel ki miya abiro ki pyerabicel, jo makwiri twatwal i kom tic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Lulevi ma gudwogo cen ma gubedo i Jerucalem gin aye Cemaya wod pa Kacub, ma wod pa Ajrikam, wod pa Kacabia, wod pa Merari;
ki Bakbakar, Kerec, Galal, ki Matania wod pa Mika ma wod pa Jikri, wod pa Acap;
ki Obadia wod pa Cemaya ma wod pa Galal, wod pa Jedutun; kacel ki Berekia wod pa Aca wod pa Elkana ma obedo i kin gaŋi pa jo Netopa.
Lugwok-doggola ot pa Lubaŋa ma gubedo i Jerucalem gin aye Calum, Akub, Talmon, Akiman ki lukakagi, ma Calum aye laditgi.
Nio wa i kare meno onoŋo gubedo lugwok-doggola ot pa Lubaŋa ma kabaka wok ki iye, yo tuŋ wokceŋ. Magi aye lugwokdoggola gaŋ pa Lulevi.

Calum wod pa Kore, ma wod pa Ebiacap, wod pa Kora, kacel ki lukakagi ma i dog ot pa kwarogi, likwayo pa Kora, gin aye lugwok dog kema, kit macalo kwarogi yam gubedo ludito ma giloyo gony pa Rwot kun gigwoko doggola me donyo.
I kare macon onoŋo Finekaci wod pa Eleajar en aye obedo ladit ma loyogi; onoŋo Rwot tye kwede.
Jekaria wod pa Mecelemia en aye onoŋo lagwok-doggola ma donyo i kema me rwatte.

Jo magi ducu ma yam giyerogi me bedo lugwok-doggola onoŋo giromo dano miya aryo ki apar wiye aryo, Gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi ki i gaŋgi. Onoŋo kabaka Daudi ki Camuel ma lanen-piny yam gumoko kwarogi i dog tic man, pien gubedo dano ma gigenogi twatwal.
Kit meno gin ki likwayogi gubedo ludito tic ma loyo doggola ot pa Rwot, en aye ot me kema pa Rwot, macalo lukur-piny.
Lugwok-doggola giketogi i kabedo aŋwen, yo tuŋ wokceŋ, yo tuŋ potoceŋ, yo tuŋ acam ki yo tuŋ acuc.
Lukakagi ma i gaŋigi myero gubin pi nino abiro kare ki kare me bedo kwedgi;
pien lugwok-doggola madito gibedo kunnu kare ducu, gin aye Lulevi ma giloyo kicika odi matinone ki odi kano lim ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Odi butogi girumo ot pa Lubaŋa, pien tic me kuro piny obedo megi, gin bene gigwoko layab me yabo ot odiko odiko.
Jo mogo i kingi onoŋo gigwoko jami ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa; i kare ducu ma gidwokogi ki ma gikwanyogi woko, gikwanogi.
Jo mukene i kingi giketogi me loyo jami ma bedo i ot pa Lubaŋa, ki jami tic maleŋ ducu, dok giloyo bene moko mapwotte, ki koŋo vino, ki moo, ki odok eceta, ki an wece.
Jo mukene ma gin litino pa ajwagi giyubo jami me aruba pi aŋwece.
Matitia, dano acel ma i kin Lulevi, ma en latin kayo pa Calum ma jo Kora, en aye obedo lalo tic me tedo mugati ma apada-ni, pien en dano ma genne.
Lukakagi mogo ma gin jo Kokat giloyo mugati ma giketo i nyim Rwot; ticgi obedo me yu bone cabit ki cabit.
Magi aye luwer, ma gin ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi; yam gibuto i kicika odi matinone ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, ma pe gitiyo tic mukene, pien yam gibedo i dog tic dyeceŋ ki dyewor.
Magi aye ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi ma i kaka pa Lulevi, ma lubo yalwakgi, gin aye ludito ma yam gibedo i Jerucalem.
Jeyel ma won Gibeon yam bedo i Gibeon; nyiŋ dakone Maaka,
latin awobine me kayo en Abudon, ka dok Jur, Kic, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Akio, Jeker, ki Miklot;
Miklot aye won Cimeam, Jo magi bene yam gubedo ma gukemme ki lukakagi ma gibedo i Jerucalem, kacel ki lukakagi.
Ner onywalo Kic, Kic onywalo Caulo, Caulo onywalo Yonacan, Malkicua, Abinadab ki Ecibaal;
Yonacan onywalo Meribaal, Meribaal onywalo Mika.
Litino awobe pa Mika gin aye Piton, Melek, Takrea ki Akaj.
Akaj onywalo Jara, Jara onywalo Alemet, Ajimavet ki Jimri. Jimri onywalo Moja,
Moja onywalo Binea; ma wode Repaya, ma wode Eleaca, ma wode Ajel.
Ajel yam tye ki litino awobe abicel, ma nyiŋgi ene: Ajrikam, Bokeru, Icmael, Cearia, Obadia ki Kanan. Jo magi aye litino awobe pa Ajel.
I kare meno jo Piliciti gulwenyo i kom Icrael. Jo Icrael guriŋo woko ki i nyim jo Piliciti, ci ginekogi i wi got Gilboa.
Jo Piliciti guriŋo gudiŋo kor Caulo ki awo bene, ci guneko Yonacan ki Abinadab ki Malkicua, gin ducu awobe pa Caulo.
Lweny ogeto matek i kor Caulo, ci wegi atero gucele woko, guketo ret i kome.

Caulo owaco bot latin jami lwennye ni, “Wot pala lucwanni woko, icoba kwede pil, wek jo ma pe gilirogini, ma pe giŋeyo Lubaŋa pe gubin i koma, miyo giyarre i koma.” Ento latin jami lwennye pe oye, pien lworo omake matek, omiyo Caulo okwanyo pala lucwanne kikome ci opoto ogurre kwede kekene.
Ka latin jami lwennye oneno ni Caulo doŋ oto woko, ci en bene opoto ogurre kene ki pala lucwanne, oto woko.
Kit meno Caulo ki awobene adek-ki kacel ki jo me ode ducu, guto woko lawaŋacel.
Ka jo Icrael ducu ma onoŋo gitye i nota guneno ni mony pa jo Icrael guriŋo woko, ki Caulo ki awobene ginekogi woko, ci guriŋo guweko gaŋigi woko; ci jo Piliciti gubino gucako bedo i gaŋi-nu.
Orwone jo Piliciti gubino ka lunyo boŋŋi ki i kom jo ma ginekogi, ci gunoŋo kom Caulo ki kom awobene adek-ki i kom got Gilboa.
Gulunyo jami lweny pa Caulo ki i kome, gucito kwede, wa ki wiye bene ma gutoŋo, ka gucwalo kwena oromo i lobo pa jo Piliciti ducu pi tero lok me yomcwiny bot jogigi ki bot lwakgi ducu.
Guketo jami lweny pa Caulo i oŋogigi; ka dok guguro wiye i ot jok Dagon.
Ento ka jo Jabec-gilead ducu guwinyo gin ma jo Piliciti gutimo i kom Caulo,
ci oteka lwenygi ducu gua, gukwanyo kom Caulo woko ki kom awobene, guterogi wa i Jabec, Ka guyiko cogogi i te yat kworo ma tye i Jabec, ci guri kec pi nino abiro.
ma pe openyo dog Rwot. Pienno omiyo Rwot oneke woko, ci okwanyo ker omiyo bot Daudi ma wod pa Yece.
Lacen jo Icrael ducu gucokke bot Daudi i Kebron, ci guwacci, “Nen ba, wan aye wa cogo komi ki riŋo komi.

I kare macon ca, wa i kare ma onoŋo Caulo aye kabaka ma loyowa, in yam itelo wi jo Icrael ka gicito ka lweny, idwokowa paco bene, Rwot Lubaŋani bene nene owaco boti ni, ‘In aye ibibedo lakwa lwakka jo Icrael, dok ibibedo laker ma loyogi.’ ”

Kit meno ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ducu gubino bot kabaka i Kebron. Kabaka Daudi oketo gicikke kwedgi i Kebron i nyim Rwot, ci guwiro Daudi obedo kabaka ma lo yo jo Icrael, kit ma yam Rwot oloko ki i dog Camuel.
Jo ma gibedo i Jebuc onoŋo guwaco bot Daudi ni, “In pe ibidonyo kany.” Ento Daudi ocito omayo gogo me Cion woko, ci odoko gaŋ kalle.
Daudi owacci, “Dano ma bikwoŋo neko jo Jebuc, en aye bibedo ladit ma lawimony.” Ci Joab wod pa Ceruya okwono ito kunnu ci en odoko laditgi.
Daudi ocako bedo i cel gogo, mumiyo gilwoŋo ni, Gaŋ kai pa Daudi.
Daudi ogero gaŋ madit orumo woko likiŋ, cakke ki i Millo; Joab ogero odi mukene ma i gaŋ ma yam oballe.
Daudi omedde odoko dit twatwal, pien onoŋo Rwot me mony aye tye kwede.
Magi gin aye ludito ki i kin twoni oteka lweny pa Daudi, jo ma yam gumiyo kony matek i kerre, kacel ki jo Icrael ducu, ci guketo en me bedo kabaka, kit ma onoŋo Rwot yam oloko i kom Icrael.
Man aye lok kom twoni oteka lweny pa Daudi: Jacobeam ma jo Kakmon en aye ladit pa jo adek-ki; en yam okato ki toŋŋe i kom jo miya adek, ci onekogi woko ducu lawaŋacel.
Ŋat ma lubo en ki i kin twoni oteka rweny acel-ki en aye Eleajar wod pa Dodo ma jo Akoki.
En obedo kacel ki Daudi i Pac-dammim i kare ma jo Piliciti gucokke ka lweny kunnu. Poto onoŋo tye kunnu ma cayiri ocek iye mabup, ci lwak ocako riŋo woko ki i nyimjo Piliciti.
Ento en ocamo co ci ocuŋ i dye poto pi laro, ocako neko jo Piliciti, ci Rwot olarogi ki loc madit twatwal.
Jo adek ki i kin ludito pyeradek-ki gulor piny wa i got ka ma Daudi bedo iye i boro Adullam; onoŋo mony pa jo Piliciti ogony i nota Repaim.
I karenu onoŋo Daudi tye i kakannene, ki cel gogo pa Lupiliciti onoŋo tye i Beterekem.
Daudi oloko ki miti madwoŋ ni, “Kono ŋatti mo ocito ka twomo pii ki i wan it Beterekem ma tye cok ki dog gaŋ ca, omiya amati, kono ber mada!”

Ci twoni lweny adek-ku gucito gubaro dye gony pa jo Piliciti, gutwomo pii ki i wan it Beterekem ma tye cok ki dog gaŋ ca, ci gukelo bot Daudi. Ento Daudi pe omato; otiŋo oliyo piny i nyim Rwot pi gityer amata,

kun wacci, “Pe obed kumeno ki i nyim Lubaŋana, an pe myero atim kit man. An aye dok amato remo pa jo-ni? Pien gukelo pi dyero komgi.” En aye lok mumiyo pe omato pii meno. Twoni lweny adek-ku yam gutimo kit meno.
Abicai omin Joab onoŋo ladit i kin jo pyeradek-ki. Otiŋo toŋŋe olwenyo i kom jo miya adek ci onekogi woko ducu, ma omiyo nyiŋe oywek ma mito rom ki jo adek ca.
Pienno olimo yweka madit ki i kom jo pyeradek-ki, ci odoko ladit wi monygi; ento pe olimo rwom pa jo adek ca.
Ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada obedo twon oteka ma i Kabjeel, latim gin madito; en oneko awobe aryo ma gin twoni labwor me Moab. En bene olor odonyo i bur ci oneko iye labwor i kare ma pee ocwer mapek.

Ka dok oneko Laejipt mo, dano ma kome pek ma borre romo futi abiro ki nucu. Laejipt meno onoŋo tye ki toŋŋe i ciŋe ma rom ki rii yat lacwe boŋo; ento en Benaya ocito bote ki odoone, ci oyuto toŋ woko ki i cin Laejipt, ka oneke kwede woko ki toŋŋe-nu.
Benaya wod pa Yekoyada otimo gin madito kit meno, omiyo nyiŋe olimo yweka madit ma mito rom ki twoni lweny adek-ki.
Nyiŋe oywek i kin jo pyeradek-ki, ento pe olimo rwom pa jo adek ca. Daudi oketo en obedo ladit pa jo ma gwoko en kabaka.
Twoni oteka lweny ma i kin lumony gin aye Acael ma omin Joab, Elkanan wod pa Dodo me Beterekem,
Camot me Karod, Kelej ma jo Palti,
Ira wod pa Ikec me Tekoa, Abiejer me Anatot,
Cibekai ma Lakucat, Ilai ma jo Akoki,
Makarai me Netopa, Keled wod pa Baana me Netopa,
Itai wod pa Ribai me Gibea pa jo Benjamin, Benaya me Ptraton,
Kurai ma bedo i nota ora me Gaac, Abiel me Arba,
Ajimavet me Bakarum, Eliaba me Caalbon,
Kacem ma jo Gijon, Yonacan wod pa Cage ma jo Karar,
Akiam wod pa Cakar ma jo Karar, Elipal wod pa Ur,
Keper ma jo Mekerat, Akija ma jo Pelon,
Kejero me Karmel, Naarai wod pa Eiibai,
Joel omin Natan, Mibkar wod pa Agri,
Jelek ma jo Ammon, Nakarai me Beerot ma latin jami lweny pa Joab wod pa Jeruya,
Ira ma jo Itri, Gareb ma jo Itri,
Uria ma jo Kit, Jabad wod pa Aklai,
Adina wod pa Cija ma jo pa Reuben, ma ladit i kin jo pa Reuben, en aye obedo ki jone pyeradek bene;
Kanan wod pa Maaka ki Yocapat ma Lamitini,
Ujia ma jo Acitera, Cama ki Jeyel ma awobe pa Ketam me Aroer,
Jediael wod pa Cimri ki ominne Joka, ma Latiji,
Eliel ma jo Makavi, ki Jeribai ki Jocavia ma awobe pa Elnaam, ki Itima ma jo Moab,
Eliel ki Obed, ki Jaciel ma jo Mejoba.
Jo magi yam gubino bot Daudi i Jiklag, i kare ma piny odiyo ma doŋ pe twero wot ka mo pi Caulo wod pa Kic; gin aye onoŋo gitye i kin twoni oteka ma gubedo ka konye i lweny.
Gin wegi atum; gin yam gicelo atero nyo gibayo kidi kadi ki ciŋgi ma lacuc ki lacam bene. Gin onoŋo jo pa Benjamin, ma i kaka pa Caulo-gi.
Laditgi obedo Akiejer, ka dok Yoaci gin aryo ducu litino pa Cema me Gibea; ka dok Jejiel ki Pelet ma awobe pa Ajimavet; ki Beraka, Yeko me Anatot.
Icmaya me Gibeon, twon oteka ma i kin jo pyeradek ca, en ladit ma loyo jo pyeradek-ku; Jeremia, Jakajiel, Yokanan, Jojabed me Gedera,
Elujai, Jerimot, Bealia, Cemaria, Cepatia ma jo Karup;
Elkana, Icia, Ajarel, Joejer ki Jacobeam, ma gin jo pa Kora,
ki Joela ki Jebadia, gin awobe pa Jerokam me Gedor.
Oteka ma guŋiyo ki lweny ma i kin jo pa Gad gugwarre gucito bot Daudi i kakannene ma i tim, oyi ta ma giŋeyo lweny ki kwot ki toŋ, ma wangi nen calo wan labwor, ma gidwir calo til ma i godi.
Gin ene: Ejer ma laditgi, me aryone Obadia, me adekke Eliab,
me aŋwenne Micimana, me abicce Jeremia,
me abicelle Atai, me abirone Eliel,
me aborone Yokanan, me aboŋwenne Elijabad,
me aparre Jeremia, me apar wiye acelle Makibanai.
Jo Gad magi ducu gin ludito ma loyo mony; ludito matinone giloyo jo miya, ki maditone loyo jo alip.
Magi gin aye jo ma yam guŋolo Jordan i dwe mukwono, i kare ma onoŋo piine opoŋ woko Libyeny nio wa i tura ci guryemo jo ma gitye i nota ducu, ma yo tuŋ wokceŋ ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ.
Ka dok jo pa Benjamin mogo, ki pa Juda, gubino bot Daudi i kakannene.

Daudi okato woko ka jolo wigi, kun waco botgi ni, “Ka ce wubino bota ki cwiny me wat pi konya, ci abibedo kwedwu ki yomcwiny. Ento ka ce wubino ka umo waŋa wek wumiya bot lumerokka, kadi bed an cwinya leŋ, ci Lubaŋa pa kwarowa myero onen ci oŋol gire.”
Ci Cwiny pa Lubaŋa obino i kom Amacai, ma en aye ladit pa jo pyeradek ca, ci owacci,
“Wan wa lwakki, in Daudi,
wabibedo kwedi, in wod pa Yece.
Kuc, kuc obed kwedi,
kuc bene obed i kom lukony in!
Pien Lubaŋani aye tye ka konyi.”
Daudi ojologi, ci oketogi gubedo ludito me buca monnye.

Jo pa Manace mogo gulokke bot Daudi i kare ma obino ki jo Piliciti ka lweny i kom Caulo. Kadi bed kumeno en pe omedo ki konyogi pien ludito pa jo Piliciti guyubo lok i kome, ci guryeme woko, kun giwacci, “Ka ce bidok bot laditte Caulo, ci doŋ wato oke.”
Jo pa Manace ma gudonyo bote i kare ma en cito i Jiklag gin ene: Adina, Jojabad, Jediael, Mikael, Jojabad, Eliu ki Jiletai, ma gin aye ludito ma loyo jo alip ma i Manace.
Gukonyo Daudi ki lweny i kom buca mony pa luyak; pien onoŋo gin ducu twoni oteka lweny ma ludito me mony.
Dano gibino ka konyo Daudi nino ki nino, nio ka gudoko cwar mony madit, ma rom ki mony pa Lubaŋa.
Magi gin aye wel dul buca mony ma guruko lweny ma yam gubino bot Daudi i Kebron pi dwoko ker pa Caulo i ciŋe, kit ma yam Rwot owaconi.
Jo pa Juda ma wegi kwot ki toŋ onoŋo giromo alip abicel ki miya aboro ma guruko lweny.
Ki jo pa Cimon ma twoni oteka lweny alip abiro ki miya acel.
Jo pa Levi alip aŋwen ki miya abicel.
Ka dok Yekoyada ma loyo jo me ot pa Aron obino ki jo alip adek ki miya abiro.
Jadok latin awobi ma twon oteka obino ki ludito wi mony pyeraryo wiye aryo ma i dog ot pa wonne kikome.
Jo pa Benjamin ma lukaka pa Caulo gubino ma romo alip adek; jo mapol ki i komgi yam gubedo ka cwako kor ot pa Caulo nio wa i kare meno.
Jo pa Epraim gubino ma romo alip pyeraryo ki miya aboro, ma gin oteka lweny ma nyiŋgi oywek i dog odi pa kwarogi.
Jo ma i nucu kaka pa Manace gubino ma romo jo alip aboro ma giyerogi ki nyiŋgi wek gubin ka keto Daudi kabaka.
Jo pa Icakar, jo ma onoŋo giŋeyo kare dok giŋeyo gin ma myero Icrael oti, gubino ki ludito miya aryo ki lukakagi ducu ma i te locgi.
Jo pa Jabulon gubino ki jo ma gunyebbe ki lweny ma romo alip pyerabic, ma gurukke pi lweny ki jami lwenygi ducu pi konyo Daudi ki cwinygi acel.
Jo pa Naputali gubino ki ludito wi mony ma romo alip acel ma gitye ki danogi alip pyeradek wiye abiro ma gutiŋo kwot ki toŋ.
Jo pa Dan gubino ki jo alip pyeraryo wiye aboro ki miya abicel ma guyubbe pi lweny.
Jo pa Acer gubino ki jo ma gunyebbe ki lweny ma romo alip pyeraŋwen, ma doŋ guyubbe pi lweny.
Jo pa Reuben, jo pa Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace ma gua loka Jordan gubino ma romo alip miya acel ki pyeraryo ma gurukke ki jami lwenygi ducu.
Lulweny magi ducu gurwayo ma guryeyo kikore, gubino kwede wa i Kebron ki cwiny mukemo keto Daudi kabaka ma loyo Icrael ducu; kit meno jo Icrael ducu mudoŋŋe gubedo ki cwiny acel me keto Daudi kabaka.
Ci gubedo ki Daudi kunnu pi nino adek kun gicamo, gimato bene, pien onoŋo utmegigi gutyeko yubbe pigi.

Dok jo ma gicok kwedgi bene, ma gua wa ki i lobo Icakar ki Jabulon ki Naputali gucom ki cam ma giketo i wi kana, ki kinaga, ki kana madito ki twoni-gu; gukelo lwak moko kwon madwoŋ, ki poki otini, ki dog tuga olok mutwo-gu, ki koŋo vino, ki moo-gu, ki twoni ki romi, pien onoŋo yomcwiny tye i Icrael.
Daudi yam oyubo lok ki ludito ma loyo buca mony me jo alip ki buca mony me jo miya, ki ludito ma i dul acel acel.

Ci Daudi oloko ki kacokke pa jo Icrael ducu kun wacci, “Ka ce bedo ber botwu, ma Rwot Lubaŋawa bene mito, ci wacwalu kwena orom kin utmegiwa ma gudoŋ i lobo Icrael ducu, kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi ma i gaŋi ma gitye ki lobo me kakwatgi, wek gubin gucokke kacel botwa.
Ka wek doŋ wakelu canduk pa Lubaŋawa botwa, pien i kare pa Caulo yam watenyo woko ata.”
Ci kacokke ducu oye ni gitim kit meno, pien lokke onen atir bot lwak ducu.
Daudi ki jo Icrael ducu gucito i Baala, ma en aye Kiriat-jearim ma tye i Juda, ka omo canduk pa Lubaŋa woko ki kunnu, en aye canduk ma gilwoŋo ki nyiŋ Rwot ma bedo i wi komker malo ka wi lukerubi.
Ci gutiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa i wi gadigadi manyen, gukelo woko nia ki i ot pa Abinadab, ci Uja ki Akio gubedo ka Leko twoni ma ywayo gadigadi.
Daudi ki jo Icrael ducu gubedo ka yarre ki myel ki yomcwiny i nyim Lubaŋa ki kero komgi ducu, ki wero wer-gu, ki goyo opuk-gu ki naŋa-gu ki ajaa-gu, ki atego agoya-gu ki tum-gu.
Ka guo i laro moyo pa Kidon, Uja ocwalo ciŋe pi mako kom canduk, pien onoŋo twoni gucato.
Ci kiniga omako Rwot i kom Uja, ci oneke woko pien onoŋo oketo ciŋe i kom canduk; oto woko kunnu i nyim Lubaŋa.
Ci kiniga omako Daudi, pien Rwot otugge i kom Uja; mumiyo kabedo-nu gilwoŋo ni Perej-uja nio wa onyoo.
Daudi obedo ki lworo i kom Lubaŋa i nino meno; owacci, “Abikelo canduk pa Lubaŋa wa paco bota niŋniŋ?”
Kit meno omiyo Daudi pe otero canduk wa i gaŋ kal pa Daudi, ento oŋak kwede woko i ot pa Obed-edom ma jo Gat.
Canduk pa Lubaŋa obedo i ot pa Obed-edom pi dwe adek; ci Rwot omiyo gum bot Obed-edom ki jone ducu.
Kiram kabaka me Turo yam ocwalo kwena bot Daudi, kun miyo bao yat cedar ki lupa-godi bene ki lupa-bao me gero ot pa Daudi.
Omiyo Daudi oniaŋ ni Rwot otyeko moko en me bedo kabaka ma loyo Icrael, dok ni otyeko miyo kerre obedo ki deyo madwoŋ pi pilo wi jone jo Icrael.
Daudi dok omedde ki nyomo mon i Jerucalem, ci onywalo awobe ki anyira mukene.
Magi aye nyiŋ litino ma onywalogi i Jerucalem. Camua, Cobab, Natan, Solomon,
Ibar, Elicua, Elpelet,
Noga, Nepeg, Japia,
Elicama. Beeliada ki Elipelet.
Ka jo Piliciti guwinyo ni Daudi doŋ gityeko wire odoko kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael ducu, ci jo Piliciti ducu gucito ka yenyo Daudi; ento Daudi owinyo pigi, okato woko ka lweny i komgi.
Onoŋo jo Piliciti gubino gumonyo nota Repaim.
Daudi ocako penyo dog Lubaŋa ni, “Ber acit ka lweny i kom jo Piliciti? Ibimiyogi i ciŋa?” Rwot ogamo doge ni, “Citi, abimiyogi i ciŋi.”
Daudi ocito wa i Baal-perajim, ci oloyogi kunnu, ci owacci, “Lubaŋa otyeko baro dye lumerok woko ki ciŋa, macalo lalele mucorre.” Mumiyo nyiŋ kabedo meno gilwoŋo ni, Baal-perajim.
Jo Piliciti gutenyo cal jogigi kenyo, ci Daudi ociko pi waŋogi woko.
Jo Piliciti dok gudwogo gumonyo nota meno.
Ka Daudi dok openyo dog Lubaŋa, ci Lubaŋa ogamo ni, “Pe ibicito i komgi atir. Wot iman ŋegi ci ipot i komgi ki ka ma okemo yadi owak.
Ka ce iwinyo kor tyen dano ma gitye ka wot lirukruk ma winnye wa i wi yadi owak, ci doij icit ka lweny, pien Lubaŋa doŋ obetelo nyimwu pi neko mony pa jo Piliciti woko.”
Daudi otiyo kit ma Lubaŋa ocike kwede, ci guneko mony pa jo Piliciti nia ki i Gibeon nio wa i Gejer.
Nyiŋ Daudi oywekoromo lobo ducu, ci Rwot omiyo lworo omako rok ducu i kom Daudi.
Daudi ogero odine i gaŋ kai pa Daudi, ci oyubo kabedo pi canduk pa Lubaŋa, ocako guro kema pire.
Daudi dok owacci, “Dano mukene pe bitiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa, ento Lulevi keken, pien Rwot yam oyerogi pi tino canduk pa Rwot ki pi tiyo bote matwal.”
Daudi ocoko jo Icrael ducu otorogi i Jerucalem, pi kelo canduk pa Rwot i kabedone ma yam oyubo pire.
Ci Daudi ocoko litino awobe pa Aron ki Lulevi kacel, gin ene:
i kin likwayo pa Kokat, Uriel ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya acel ki pyeraryo;
i kin likwayo pa Merari, Acaya ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya aryo ki pyeraryo;
i kin likwayo pa Gercon, Joel ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya acel ki pyeradek;
i kin likwayo pa Elicapan, Cemaya ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya aryo;
i kin likwayo pa Kebron, Eliel ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine pyeraboro;
i kin likwayo pa Ujiel, Aminadab ma laditgi, ki utmegine miya acel ki apar wiye aryo.
Daudi dok olwoŋo ajwagi Jadok ki Abiatar, ki Lulevi magi, Uriel, Acaya, Joel, Cemaya, Eliel ki Aminadab,

ci owaco botgi ni, “Wun aye ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwarowu ma jo pa Levi; wulonnye kekenwu wubed maleŋ, wun kacel ki utmegiwu, wek wukel canduk pa Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, i kabedo ma atyeko yubone pire.
I kare mukwono ca onoŋo Rwot Lubaŋa otugge i komwa, pien pe wun aye onoŋo wutiŋo i kare-nu, pien pe yam wapenyo doge i kit ma cik mito.”
Kit meno ajwagi ki Lulevi gulonnye kekengi pi kelo canduk pa Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Lulevi gucako tiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa, gulebo ki talle i wi gwokgi, kit ma yam Moses ocikogi kwede, macalo Rwot owaco.
Daudi dok ociko ludito pa Lulevi pi yero utmegigi wek gubed luwer ma gibigoyo jami wer maloŋo, naŋa ki opuk ki atego agoya-gu, me tino dwan malo ki yomcwiny.
Kit meno Lulevi gucako yero Eman wod pa Joel, ka dok Acap wod pa Berekia ki i kin utmegine. I kin likwayo pa Merari guyero utmegigi magi, Etan wod pa Kucaya;
ka dok guyero utmegigi ma i dul me aryo, gin aye Jekaria, Jajiel, Cemiramot, Jekiel, Uni, Eliab, Benaya, Maaceya, Matitia, Elipeleku ki Mikneya, ki lugwok-doggola Obed-edom ki Jeyel.
Luwer magi Eman, Acap ki Etan ticgi obedo me goyo atego mola;
Jekaria, Ajiel, Cemiramot, Jekiel, Uni, Eliab, Maaceya ki Benaya ticgi obedo me goyo naŋa i kit me Alamot;
ento Matitia, Elipeleku, Mikneya, Obed-edom, Jeyel ki Ajajia gin ticgi obedo me telo wer ki opuk i kit me Ceminit.
Kenania, ma en aye latelwer pa Lulevi, ticce me nyuto kit me wer pien en aye niaŋ maber.
Berekia ki Elkana yam gin lugwok-doggola me canduk pa Lubaŋa.
Cebania, Jocapat, Netanel, Amacai, Jekaria, Benaya ki Eleajar, ma gin ducu ajwagi, ticgi me kuto tum i nyim canduk pa Lubaŋa, Obed-edom ki Jekia gin bene gubedo lugwok-doggola me canduk pa Lubaŋa.
Kit meno Daudi ki ludoŋo pa jo Icrael, ki ludito ma loyo jo alip, gucako wot me omo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot nia ki i ot pa Obed-edom ma cwinygi yom matek.
Gucako tumo twoni abiro ki nyogi romi abiro, pien Lubaŋa okonyo Lulevi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot.
Daudi onoŋo orukke ki jor me camanini maberre, macalo Lulevi ducu ma gutiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa, kacel ki luwer, ki Kenana ma latel-wer pa luwer ducu; Daudi onoŋo otweyo pyere ki epod me camanini.
Yam jo Icrael ducu gukelo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot kit meno, ma giwayo ma rwatte ki koko bila, ki tum, ki atego agoya-gu, kun giwero ki naŋa ki opuk-gu maloŋo.
Ka canduk me gicikke pa Rwot obino wa i gaŋ kai pa Daudi, ci Mikal ma nya pa Caulo obolo wane woko ki i wan dirica oneno kabaka Daudi ka myelo ma cwinye yom, ci obedo ka cayo en ki i cwinye.
Gukelo canduk pa Lubaŋa wa paco, gucibo i kema ma yam Daudi oguro pire; gucako tyero gitum awaŋa ki gityer lakwecwiny i nyim Lubaŋa.
Ka Daudi otyeko tyero gitum awaŋa-gu ki gityer lakwecwiny, ci ocako lamo gum i kom lwak i nyiŋ Rwot.
Lacen ocako poko jami ki jo Icrael ducu, co wa ki mon; dano acel acel gimiye mugati acel, ki riŋo anida, ki poki olok mutwone.
Dok oketo Lulevi mogo pi bedo lutic i nyim canduk pa Rwot, pi lwoŋo nyiŋ Lubaŋa, pi pwoyo en ki pi pako Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Acap aye laditgi, ki me aryone ma lube obedo Jekaria, Jeyel, Cemiramot, Jekiel, Matitia, Eliab, Benaya, Obed-edom ki Jeyel, gin aye lugo naŋa ki opuk. Acap onoŋo goyo atego agoya,
ki Benaya ki Jakajiel ma ajwagi gin aye lukut tum teretere i nyim canduk me gicikke pa Rwot.
I kare meno en aye nino ma Daudi okwono ciko ni Acap ki utmegine gubed ka wero wer me pwoyo Rwot, kit man:
Wumi pwoc bot Rwot, wulwoŋ nyiŋe,
wumi ticce oŋene i rok ducu!
Wuwer bote wer me pako en,
wutit ticce me aura ducu!
Wuket deyo i kom nyiŋe maleŋ;
jo ma yenyo Rwot cwinygi obed yom!
Wubin bot Rwot wek wunoŋ tek ki bote,
wubed i nyime nakanaka.
Wupo kom tic me aura ma en otiyo ducu,
ginaura ma yam otiyo ki kop ma oŋolo,
wun likwayo pa Abraim ma yam laticce,
wun litino pa Yakobo ma en oyerowu.
En aye Rwot Lubaŋawa;
kop ma en oŋolo romo i lobo ducu.
En cwinye omoko i kom gicikkene ma bedo nakanaka,
i kom lok ma yam ociko, pi yatwak alip ki alip,
ki lok ma yam okwoŋo ki Icaka,
wek obed gicikke ki Icrael matwal,
kun wacci, “Abimiyo lobo Kanaan botwu,
obed lobo me aleyawu.”
I kare ma pud gin nok, ma welgi tidi,
ma pud gin lubedo i lobo-nu,
ma giwirre i kin rok mapatpat,
ma gia i te ker acel, gikobo i rok mukene,
ojuko luker mapol pigi kun wacci,
“Pe wugud kom jo ma an awirogi,
pe wutim lunebina marac!”
Wuwer bot Rwot, wun lobo ducu!
wutit pi larre nino ducu.
Wutuc deyone bot lurok,
wutit ticce me aura bot rok ducu!
Rwot aye dit, myero gipake twatwal,
myero gilwore makato lubaŋa mukene-gu ducu.
Pien lubaŋa pa lurok ducu gin cal jogi apaya,
ento Rwot aye oketo polo.
Deyo ki dit tye bote,
tek ki yomcwiny tye ka ma en bedo iye.
Wun kaka me rok ducu, wumi deyo bot Rwot,
wumi deyo ki tek bot Rwot!
Wumi deyo bot Rwot muporo nyiŋe;
wukel gityer, wubin wa i nyime!
Wuwor Rwot ki boŋo maleŋ;
komwu omyel i nyime, wun lobo ducu;
ada, lobo ocuŋ matek ma pe yeŋŋe.
Polo iye obed yom lobo bene
obed ma cwinye yom,
dano guwac i kin lurok ni, “Rwot tye ka loc!”
Wek nam omor, ki gin mupoŋ iye,
poto bene oum, ki jami ducu ma tye iye!
Yadi ma i buŋa ducu gibiwer ki yomcwiny
i nyim Rwot, pien obebino ka ŋolo kop i kom lobo.
mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka!
Wuwac bene ni,
“Larwa, ai Lubaŋa lalarwa,
icokwa ci ilarwa ki i kin lurok,
wek wapwo nyiŋi maleŋ, waum ka wapaki.
Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael,
nia con ki con nio nino ma pe tum!”
Lwak ducu gugamo ni, “Amen!” ci gupako Rwot.
Daudi oweko Acap ki utmegine i nyim canduk me gicikke pa Rwot wek gubed ka tic kunnu i nyim canduk pa Rwot kit ma mitte kwede i nino acel acel,
ka dok Obed-edom ki utmegine pyerabicel wiye aboro, kun Obed-edom wod pa Jedutun ki Koca gubedo lugwok-doggola.
Dok oweko ajwaka Jadok ki utmegine ma gin ajwagi wa i nyim kema pa Rwot i ka woro Lubaŋa i wi got ma tye i Gibeon,
pi tumo gitum awaŋa bot Rwot i wi keno tyer me gitum awaŋa, kun lubo lok ducu ma gicoyo i cik pa Rwot ma yam ociko ki io Icrael.
Ki Eman ki Jedutun gunywako tic kwedgi, kacel ki jo mukene ma yam giyerogi ki nyiŋgi pi miyo pwoc bot Rwot pi mar mere ma bedo nakanaka.
Eman ki Jedutun onoŋo gitye ki tura ki atego agoya pi wer agoya, ki jami agoya mukene ma gigoyo i kare me wero wer maleŋ, Litino awobe pa Jedutun yam giketogi pi gwoko doggola ot pa Rwot.
I kare ma doŋ Daudi obedo i ode, ocako waco bot lanebi Natan ni, “Nen ba, an doŋ abedo i ot baorcedar, ento canduk me gicikke pa Rwot pud bedo i kema.”
Ci Natan odok Iye bot Daudi ni, “Tigin ducu ma tye i cwinyi, pien Lubaŋa tye kwedi.”
Ento i dyewor acel-lu lok pa Rwot dok obino bot Natan ni,
“Cit icitit bot laticca Daudi ni Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘In pe ibigerra ot me bedo.
Pien peya abedo i ot mo nia wa i kine ma atelo iye wi Icrael nio kwede wa onyoo-ni, ento abedo ka kobo nia ki i kema man nio wa i kema mukene, ki nia ki i kabedo man nio wa i kabedo mukene.
Kabedo ducu ma abedo ka wirre iye ki jo Icrael ducu, an yam koŋ aloko lok mo bot luŋolkop me Icrael ma yam acikogi pi kwayo lwakka kun awacci, “Piŋo pe koŋ wugerra ot mo me bao cedar?” ’
Koni doŋ ibiwaco ki laticca Daudi ni, ‘Rwot me mony owaco kuman ni, an yam akwanyi ki kakwat i olet, ka ma ibedo ka leko iye romi, wek ibed laker ma loyo jona jo Icrael;
dok abedo ka loŋŋe kwedi i kabedo ma icito iye ducu, abedo ka jwero lumerokki woko ki i nyimi. Dok abimiyo nyiŋi ywek, ma rom ki nyiŋ jo madito ma i wi lobo-ni.
Dok abimiyo kabedo ki jona jo Icrael; ci abiketogi iye, wek doŋ gubed i kabedogi kikome, ma pe doŋ giyelogi matwal, wa lulweny magwa bene pe dok bipoto i komgi i kare mo, kit ma con ca,
ma nia wa i kare ma con aketo luŋolkop ma guloyo jona jo Icrael; ci abitayo lumerok meri ducu. Ento atucci ni. Rwot bimiyo odi bedo madit.
Ka kareni oromo me yweyo kacel ki kwarini, ci abiketo lakwaru mo ma bilubi bedo dit, ma ŋat acel i kom likwayi kikomi, ci abimoko kerre bedo matek.
En aye bigerra ot, an abimoko komkerre bedo matwal.
Abibedo wonne, ki en bibedo woda; pe abikwanyo mar mera ma pe lokke ki i kome, kit ma yam akwanyo ki i kom ŋat mutelo nyimi-ni.
Ento abimoko en i oda ki i kerra matwal; ki komker mere bene bimoko matwal.’ ”
Natan otito bot Daudi kit lok magi ducu, ki kit ginanyuta ma onen bote ducu.
Lacen Kabaka Daudi ocito obedo piny i nyim Rwot, ci owacci, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, an aŋa, oda kono gin aŋo, mumiyo ikonya nio wa onyoo-ni?
Pud ibwono kony man ni tidi ki tuŋ boti, ai Lubaŋa; ibedo ka lok i kom oda kit ma bibedo kwede pi kare malac ma tye anyim, dok inyutta bene likwaya ma anyim, ai Rwot Lubaŋa.
An Daudi dok abiwacci kit lok aŋo i kom deyo ma imiyo bota? Pien in iŋeya, an ma abedo laticci-ni.
Pira keken, ai Rwot, dok pi cwinyi giri keni, omiyo itiyo gin madito magu ducu, pi miyo gin madito ducu ma kit man oŋene.
Pe tye ŋatti mo macalo in, ai Rwot, dok pe tye Lubaŋa mo, kono in keken, kit ma yam wawinyo ki itwa-ni.

Rok mene ma wi lobo ma rom ki joni jo Icrael, ma yam Lubaŋa ocito ka kokogi wek gubed jone, wek nyiŋi oywek pigi, pi tiyo gin madito ma miyo dano lworo, ki pi ryemo rok mapol kacel ki lubaŋagi i nyim lwakki, ma yam in ikokogi ki i Ejipt?
In ityeko miyo lwakki jo Icrael gudoko joni nakanaka; dok in, ai Rwot, yam idoko Lubaŋagi.
Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, kombeddi doŋ imok lok meri ma yam iwaco i koma ki i kom jo ma i oda matwal, ci doŋ itim kit ma ityeko waco-ni.
Mok lok ma iwaco-ni, wek nyiŋi obed me adwora nakanaka kun giwacci, ‘Rwot Lubaŋa me mony, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, en aye Lubaŋa ma loyo Icrael,’ ki ot pa laticci Daudi bimoko i nyimi matwal.
Pien in, Lubaŋa, ityeko nyuto bota ni ibimiyo oda bedo madit; mumiyo an laticci alimo tekcwiny me kela lega man i nyimi.
Ai Rwot, in aye Lubaŋa, ci in doŋ ityeko cikke me timo gin man maber pira.
Pi meno, mi gum i kom dano ma i oda ki yomcwiny, wek likwaya gumedde ameda ki bedo i nyimi nakanaka; pien gin ma in imiyo gum, gumme bedo nakanaka, ai Rwot.”
Lacen Daudi dok otayo jo Piliciti, ocako loyogi, ci omayo Gat ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti.
Daudi dok otayo jo Moab, ci jo Moab gudoko luticce, kun giculo mucoro bote.
Daudi dok otayo Adadejer kabaka me Joba, ma yo tun Kamat, ma yam ocito ka cibo got me po en i dog kulu Euprate.

Daudi omako gadigadi lwennye alip acel, ki wegi aguragura alip abiro, ki askari ma giwoto ki tyengi alip pyeraryo oŋolo odoŋ tyen aguraguragi ducu ma yam giywayo gadigadi Lwenygi, ento oweko mogo manok odoŋ ma romo ywayo gadigadi miya acel.
Ka jo Ciria me Damaciko gubino ka konyo kor Adadejer kabaka me Joba, Daudi oneko jo Ciria alip pyeraryo wiye aryo.
Daudi oketo lumony i cel gogo i lobo Ciria ma i te loc me Damaciko; ci jo Ciria gudoko lutic pa Daudi, kun giculo mucoro bote. Rwot obedo ka miyo tek me bwoyo lobo bot Daudi ka ma yam ocito iye ducu.
Daudi oyako lwak kwodi me jabu ma yam lwak pa Adadejer tiŋogi, ci oterogi i Jerucalem.
Daudi oyako lwak mola mapol ki i gaŋi magi, Tibat ki Kun, ma onoŋo yam gaŋi pa Adadejer. Man aye mola ma yam Solomon otiyo kwede nam me mola, ki wir, ki agulu mola-gu.
Ka cen Tou kabaka me Kamat owinyo ni Daudi otyeko tayo mony pa Adadejer woko ducu liweŋ,

ci ocwalo wode Adoram bot kabaka Daudi ka mote, ki pi pwoyo en pi lweny i kom Adadejer ki pi loyo en woko; pien yam Adadejer obedo ka lweny ki Tou tyen mapol. Dok ocwalo lwak jami mapol me jabu, ki me ryal ki me mola-gu;
jami meno bene kabaka Daudi yam odyerogi bot Rwot, kacel ki ryal ki jabu ma yam oyakogi nia ki i rok ducu, nia wa i lobo Edom, Moab, ki bot jo Ammon ki jo Piliciti ki jo Amalek.
Ci oketo lumony i cel gogo i Edom; ci jo Edom ducu gudoko lutic pa Daudi. Rwot omiyo Daudi obwoyo lobo ka ma yam ocito iye ducu.
Daudi oloyo jo Icrael ducu kit meno; obedo ka ŋolo kop atir dok kakare i kom lwakke ducu.
Joab wod pa Jeruya obedo ladit me mony; ki Yekocapat wod pa Akilud obedo laco lok ma timme;
Jadok wod pa Akitub ki Akimelek wod pa Abiatar gubedo ajwagi; Cavica obedo karan,
ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada obedo ladit ma loyo jo Keret ki jo Pelet; ki awobe pa Daudi gubedo ludito ma loyo tic pa kabaka.
Ka man otum, Nakac kabaka pa jo Ammon oto woko, ci wode oleyo ka tyene.

Daudi owacci, “Abinyuto cwiny me mar bot Kanun wod pa Nakac, kit ma yam wonne onyuto cwiny me mar bota-ni.” Mumiyo Daudi ocwalo lukwena bote ka kweyo cwinye pi to pa wonne, Lutic pa Daudi guo bot Kanun i lobo pa jo Ammon ka kweyo cwinye.
Ento rwodi pa jo Ammon guwaco bot Kanun ni, “In itamo ni Daudi ocwalo lukwe cwinyi pi keto deyo i kom woru? Daudi mono pe ocwalo luticce ka ŋiyo piny, ki ka turo gaŋ, ki pi roto lobo ducu?”
Kit meno omiyo Kanun omako lutic pa Daudi, ci olyelo yer tikgi, ka dok oŋolo dye boŋogi i kom pyergi, ka ocwalogi kwede woko; ci gucito.
Ka gitito bot Daudi pi jo meno, ci ocwalo dano ka jologi, pien onoŋo gitye ki lewic madwoŋ twatwal. Ci kabaka owacci, “Koŋ wubed i Jeriko, nio ka yer tikwu otwi olot, ka doŋ wudwog kany.”

Ka jo Ammon guneno ni pigi odoko ŋwe marac bot Daudi, ci Kanun ki jo Ammon gucwalo ryal ma romo talanta alip acel ka wilo gadigadi lweny ki wegi aguragura ki bot jo Mecopotamia, wa ki i lobo Arammaaka, ki i Joba.
Ci guwilo gadigadi lweny alip pyeradek wiye aryo, ki kabaka me Maaka bene, ma onoŋo obino ki monnye, ogony i nyim Medeba. Jo Ammon bene gucokke ki i gaŋigi, gubino ka lweny.
Ka Daudi owinyo pigi, ci ocwalo Joab kacel ki mony pa twoni oteka lweny ducu.
Ci jo Ammon gubino gurwayo cok ka guryeyo i dog gaŋ; luker ma gubino guryeyo kengi, i dye bar. 403
Ka Joab oneno mony okace woko ryoryo, tuŋ nyime ki yo tuŋ ŋeye bene, ci oyero jo Icrael ma oyita lweny, ocako ryeyogi gukemo jo Ciria;
oketo jo mudoŋŋe bot ominne Abicai, gin bene guryeyo gukemo jo Ammon.
Joab owacci, “Ka ce jo Ciria gubedo tek i koma, ci ibikonya, ento ka jo Ammon aye gubedo tek i komi, an abikonyi.
Bed oteka ma cwinye nwaŋ, wek walweny pi lutuwa, ki pi gaŋi pa Lubaŋawa, Rwot bene otim gin ma oneno ni ber.”
Kit meno Joab ki jo ma gitye kwede ducu gurwayo cok ka lweny i kom jo Ciria; ci jo Ciria guriŋo woko ki i nyime.
Ka jo Ammon guneno jo Ciria guriŋo woko, ci gin bene gucako riŋo woko ki i nyim Abicai omin Joab, gudonyo wa i gaŋ, Ci Joab obino i Jerucalem.
Ento ka jo Ciria guneno jo Icrael guloyogi, gucwalo lukwena ci gukelo jo Ciria ma gitye loka Euprate, kacel ki Copak ma lawimony pa Adadejer ma latel wigi.

Ka gitito pigi bot Daudi, ci en bene ocoko jo Icrael ducu oŋolo kwedgi kulu Jordan, ci obino i komgi, oryeyo monnye orwayo i komgi. Ka Daudi doŋ oryeyo monnye, orwayo kom jo Ciria, gucako lweny kwede.
Jo Ciria gucako riŋo woko ki i nyim Icrael; Daudi oneko jo Ciria ma romo riŋo ki gadigadi lweny alip abiro, ki askari ma woto ki tyengi alip pyeraŋwen, ka dok oneko Copak ladit me monygi bene.
Ka lutic pa Adadejer guneno jo Icrael gutyeko loyogi woko, ci guketo kuc i kingi ki Daudi, ci gudoko luticce. Kit meno jo Ciria pe dok gubedo ki miti me konyo jo Ammon i kare mo.
Ci Daudi okwanyo lalukana me jabu ki i wi kabakagi; pekke romo ratili miya acel, got me wei bene onoŋo tye iye. Ci gicibo i wi Daudi. Dok okelo jami ma giyako i gaŋ meno madwoŋ twatwal.

Dok okelo jo ma giyakogi ki i gaŋ meno, ci oketogi ka tic ki mucumeno ki cururu nyonyo ki latoŋ-gu, Daudi obedo ka timo jo ma i gaŋi pa jo Ammon ducu kit meno. Ci Daudi ki lwak ducu gucako dok cen wa i Jerucalem.
Lacen lweny dok ocakke i kom jo Piliciti ma i Gejer; ci Cibekai ma Lakucat oneko Cipai woko, ma onoŋo en ŋat acel ma i kin likwayo pa twon oluma-ni; yam giloyo jo, Piliciti kit meno.
Ka lweny dok ocakke i kom jo Piliciti; ci Elkanan wod pa Jair oneko Lami ma omin Goliac ma jo Gat, ma bol toŋŋe rom ki rii yat lacwe boŋo.

Lweny dok obedo i Gat ka ma tye iye dano mo ma oputte mabor liwawo, ma tye ki nyig ciŋe abicel, ki nyig tyene bene abicel, tuŋ ryoryo ducu, ci nyig Lwete ducu romo pyeraryo wiye aŋwen; en bene yam lakwar twoni oluma-nu.
Ka okatti ka nywaro jo Icrael ki ŋala, ci Yonacan wod pa Cimea ma omin Daudi oneko en woko.
Jo man gin likwayo pa twoni oluma ma i Gat; gin ducu Daudi kacel ki luticce gutyekogi woko.
Catan ocuŋ ka lweny i kom Icrael, ocako piyo Daudi pi kwano wel jo Icrael.
Kit meno Daudi owaco bot Joab ki ludito me mony ducu ni, “Wucit ka kwano wei jo Icrael, cakke ki i Beer-ceba nio kwede wa i Dan, ci wudwok lokke bota, wek aŋe welgi.”

Ento Joab ojuko Daudi kun owaco ni, “Myero Rwot Lubaŋa aye omed wei lwak tyen miya kulu, kit ma doŋ gidwoŋ-ŋi! Pe gin ducu lwakki, rwoda kabaka, gin ducu luticci, rwoda. Ci piŋo imito lakit tim macalo man i Piŋo imito kela bal i kom Icrael?”
Ento lok pa kabaka obedo tek makato pa Joab. Omiyo Joab oa ocito orumo lobo Icrael ducu, ka odwogo kwede cen i Jerucalem.

Ka Joab ocako miyo wel lwak ma okwano-ni bot Daudi. Jo Icrael ducu onoŋo giromo milion acel ki alip miya acel ma gin wegi pala lucwan, ki i Juda giromo alip miya aŋwen ki pyerabiro ma gin wegi pala lucwan.
Ento Joab pe okwano wel jo pa Levi ki pa Benjamin, pien onoŋo cwiny Joab dag cik pa kabaka.
Ento cwiny Lubaŋa pe obedo yom i kom lok meno; ocako neko jo Icrael.
Ci Daudi ocako bako doge bot Lubaŋa kun waco ni, “Abalo twon bal mo madit pi gin ma doŋ atyeko tiyone. Kombeddi doŋ alegi, ikwany roc pa laticci woko; pien atimo lok man me miŋo twatwal.”
Rwot ocako lok ki Gad, ma lanen pa Daudi, kun wacci,
“Cit iciwac bot Daudi ni, ‘Rwot owaco kuman ni, Amiyi lok adek; in ikwany acel ki i kingi, wek ami opot i komi.’ ”
Kit meno Gad obino bot Daudi ci otitte lok meno ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni ‘Kwany acel ma imitone!

Imito kec opot pi mwaka adek; nyo lumerokwu oryemwu pi dwe adek, kun ginekowu ki pala lucwan; nyo pala pa Rwot aye opot i loboni ki two gemo pi nino adek kulu, kun lamalaika pa Rwot neko jo ma i lobo Icrael tyeko woko ducu?’ In doŋ itam kit lok ma abidok kwede bot ŋat ma ocwala boti-ni.”
Daudi owaco bot Gad ni, “An doŋ adonyo i twon can madit ma pe wacce; wek apot i cin Rwot, pien kicane dwoŋ; ento pe apot i cin dano.”
Kit meno Rwot ocako cwalo two gemo opoto i kom Icrael; ci jo Icrael guto ma romo co alip pyerabiro.

Ci Lubaŋa ocwalo lamalaika i kom Jerucalem pi tyekone woko; ento ka doŋ mito tyekone, ci Rwot oneno, ci oŋut i kom gin marac man, ci ojuko lamalaika ma lanek piny-nyi woko, kun wacci, “Man doŋ oromo, doŋ ikul ciŋi piny.” Lamalaika pa Rwot onoŋo ocuŋ i ŋet laro moyo pa Oman ma jo Jebuc.

Ka Daudi otiŋo waŋe malo ci oneno lamalaika pa Rwot ocuŋ i kin lobo ki polo, kun ciŋe owoto pala lucwan otiŋo i kom Jerucalem. Ci Daudi ki ludoŋo ducu, gucako ruko boŋo cola, gupoto kwede piny aryeba cwiny.

Daudi owaco bot Lubaŋa ni, “Pe an aye yam aciko pi kwano wel lwak? An aye yam abalo atyeko tiyo roc madit twatwal, ento lwak romi man, gutimo kit roc aŋo? Alegi ni, wek ciŋi opot i koma ki i kom ot pa kwara keken; pe iwek two gemo opot wa i kom lwakki.”
Lamalaika pa Rwot dok ociko Gad ni owac ki Daudi wek ocit ka caŋo keno tyer pi Rwot i laro moyo pa Oman ma jo Jebuc.
Daudi ocito kunnu pi lok pa Gad, ma onoŋo oloko kit ma Rwot ocike kwede.
I kare-nu onoŋo Oman tye ka dino ŋano; ka olokke ci oneno lamalaika, awobene aŋwen ma yam gitye kwede gukanne woko.
Ka Daudi woto cito bot Oman, ci Oman oneno; ka oneno Daudi ci oa ki i laro ocito bot Daudi, omiye woro kun oryebbe piny i nyime.
Daudi owaco bot Oman ni, “Miya kabedo man me laro moyo wek acan iye keno tyer pi Rwot, miya awil pi welle kikome, wek two gemo oke woko i kom lwak.”
Omao owaco bot Daudi ni, “Ber iter; wek in, rwoda kabaka, ityer iye gin ma ineno ni ber; nen amiyo twon me gitum awaŋa, ki opam ladin bel me yen, ki nyig ŋano me gityer me moko kwon; amiyogi ducu.”
Ento kabaka Daudi ogamo dog Oman ni, “Pe kumeno, ento abiwilo i welle kikome; pe abityero jamini ma pe mera bot Rwot, pe abimiyo gitum awaŋa ma pe awilo ki Limma.”
Kit meno Daudi ocako miyo bot Oman cekel me jabu miya abicel ma gipimo pekgi pi wilo kabedo-nu.
Ci Daudi ocako caŋo keno tyer pi Rwot kunnu, ka otyero gitum awaŋa ki gitum lakwecwiny-gu, ocako lwoŋo iye nyiŋ Rwot, ci Rwot odok iye ki mac ma oa i polo ma obino i kom keno tyer me gitum awaŋa.
Rwot ociko lamalaika, ci orwako pala lucwanne i akurane.
I kare meno, ka Daudi oneno ni Rwot otyeko dokke iye ki i laro moyo pa Oman ma jo Jebuc, ci obedo ka tyero gitumme ducu kunnu.
Pien kema pa Rwot ma Moses yam oti yo i tim, ki keno tyer me gitum awaŋa bene onoŋo pud gitye wa i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa i wi got ma tye Gibeon;
ento Daudi yam pe cito kunnu ka penyo dog Rwot Lubaŋa, pien obedo ka lworo pala lucwan pa lamalaika pa Rwot.
Daudi dok owacci, “Ot pa Rwot Lubaŋa bibedo kany, ki keno tyer me gitum awaŋa pi jo Icrael bene bibedo kany.”
Daudi ociko pi coko lurok ma onoŋo gibedo i lobo Icrael, ci oketo lupa-godi ka yubo godi ma gipayogi mabeco pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa.
Daudi dok okano lwak nyonyo madwoŋ me yubo mucumar pi guro kika me dog gaŋ, ki okol latwe bao, ki lwak mola madwoŋ ma pekke pe pimme,
ki lwak bao cedar ma welle pe kwanne, pien jo Cidon ki jo Turo gukelo bot Daudi bao cedar madwoŋ twatwal.

Pien Daudi yam owacci, “Latinna Solomon pud tidi, peya tye ki ŋec mo, dok ot ma gibigero pi Rwot myero obed me deyo makato ducu, wek ywekane ki deyone orom lobo ducu; mumiyo an aye ayubo kit gerone.” Pienne Daudi ocako yubo lwak jami madwoŋ twatwal ma pud kwo.
Ka dok olwoŋo wode Solomon, ociko en pi gero ot pa Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Daudi owaco ki Solomon ni, “Woda, onoŋo abedo ki tam i cwinya pi gero ot mo pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋa.
Ento lok pa Rwot yam obino bota kun wacci, ‘In doŋ ityeko oyo lwak remo mapol, dok ibedo ka Lwenyo lweny madito-gu; pe ibigero ot mo pi nyina, pien ityeko oyo lwak remo madwoŋ i nyima ki i wi lobo.
Nen ba, ibinywalo latin laco; en bibedo ki kuc, abimiye kuc ma lumerokke ducu pe gibiyele; pienno nyiŋe bibedo Solomon, dok abimiyo kuc ki yweyo bot Icrael i karene.
En aye bigero ot pi nyiŋa, En bibedo woda, ki an abibedo wonne, dok abimoko komkerre bedo i Icrael matwal.’
Iyo latinna, Rwot obed kwedi, wek ityek gero ot pa Rwot Lubaŋani, kit ma yam oloko kwede i komi-ni.
Atikane, Rwot aye myero omiyi ryeko ki niaŋ matut, wek ibed ka lubo cik pa Rwot Lubaŋani ka en doŋ omiyi dit me loyo Icrael.
Dok ibilimo gum ka ce ibedo ka gwoko kit cik ducu ki ŋol ducu ma cen Rwot ociko ki Moses pi jo Icrael. Bed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ. Pe ilwor; cwinyi pe opoti.

Nen an doŋ ayelle mada ci doŋ atyeko yubo jami magi pi ot pa Rwot: jabu ma romo talanta alip miya acel, ryal ma romo talanta milion acel, ki mola ki nyonyo ma pekke pe pimme, pien gidwoŋ twatwal; ka dok ayubo bao ki got-gu, In dok imed mu kene i komgi.
Dok it ye ki lwak lutic mapol: I upa-godi, lugedo ki godi, lupac ki ludiro tic ducu ma welgi pe kwanne, ki jo ma gikwiri i ticgi,
ma gitiyo ki jabu, ki ryal-gu, ki mola ki nyonyo-gu, Doŋ ia malo icak tic cut! Rwot obed kwedi.”
Daudi dok ociko ludito ma i Icrael ducu pi konyo wode Solomon kun wacci,
“Rwot Lubaŋa tye kwedwu? Dok pe en aye omiyowu kuc i kabedo ducu? En aye otyeko miyo wegi lobo-ni i ciŋa; dok lobo doŋ gitayo ki i nyim Rwot ki i nyim lwakke.

Iyo, kombeddi doŋ wuket tamwu ki cwinywu ka yenyo Rwot Lubaŋawu. Doŋ wutwarre malo wuciger kabedo maleŋ pa Rwot Lubaŋa, ka wek canduk me gicikke pa Rwot ki jami pa Lubaŋa maleŋ-gu ducu gikelgi wa i ot ma doŋ gigero pi nyiŋ Rwot.”
Daudi ocoko ludito ma i Icrael ducu, kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi.
Gikwano Lulevi ducu ma ditogi romo mwaka pyeradek dok kwede malo, ci wel co ducu oromo alip pyeradek wiye aboro.
Daudi owacci, “Jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen ki i komgi gibiketogi ka tic i ot pa Rwot; jo alip abicel gibibedo jagi ki luŋolkop;
jo alip aŋwen gibibedo lugwok-doggola, ki jo alip aŋwen gibipako Rwot ki jami wer ma yam atiyo pi pake kwede.”
Ci Daudi opokogi i dul muporo awobe pa Levi, Gercom, Kokat ki Merari.
Litino awobe pa Gercom gin aye Ladan ki Cimei.
Litino awobe pa Ladan gin aye Jekiel ma laditgi, ki Jetam ki Joel, gin adek.
Litino awobe pa Cimei gin aye Celomot, Kajiel ki Karan, gin adek. Magi gin aye ludito kaka pa Ladan ma i odi pa kwarogi.
Litino awobe pa Cimei gin aye Jakat, Jina, Jeuc ki Beria. Jo aŋwen-nu gin aye litino awobe pa Cimei.
Jakat aye onoŋo laditgi, ki me aryone Jija; ento Jeuc ki Beria pe gunywalo awobe mapol, mumiyo gikwanogi macalo dog ot ma kwarogi acel.
Litino awobe pa Kokat gin aye Amram, Ijar, Kebron ki Ujiel, gin aŋwen.
Litino awobe pa Amram gin aye Aron ki Moses. Aron gibolle tic me kwero jami maleŋ makato, wek en ki litino awobene guwan odok eceta i nyim Rwot matwal, dok guti bote, gulam gum i nyiŋe matwal.
Ento litino awobe pa Moses ma dano pa Lubaŋa yam gikwanogi i kin kaka pa Levi.
Litino awobe pa Moses gin aye Gercom ki Eliejer.
Litirro awobe pa Gercom: Cebuel aye laditgi.
Litino awobe pa Eliejer: Rekabia aye laditgi. Eliejer pe onywalo litino awobe mukene, ento Rekabia onywalo litino awobe mapol mada.
Litino awobe pa Ijar, Celomit aye laditgi.
Litino awobe pa Kebron gin aye Jeria ma laditgi, ki me aryone Amaria, me adekke Jakajiel, ki me aŋwenne Jekameam.
Litino awobe pa Ujiel gin aye Mika ma laditgi, ki me aryone Icia.
Litino awobe pa Merari gin aye Makali ki Muci. Litino awobe pa Makali gin aye Eleajar ki Kic.
Eleajar oto ma pe onywalo awobe, onywalo anyira keken; ento ludoggolagi ma awobe pa Kic aye gunyomogi.
Litino awobe pa Muci gin aye Makali, Eder ki Jeremot, gin adek.

Magi aye litino awobe pa Levi ma i odi pa kwarogi, ma gin ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi kit ma yam gicoyogi kwede, ma lubo wei ki nyiŋ dano ki acel acel ma ditogi romo mwaka pyeraryo dok kwede malo, ma gibedo ka tiyo tic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Pien Daudi onoŋo owacci, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael doŋ omiyo kuc ki jone; en doŋ bedo: i Jerucalem matwal.
Pi meno Lulevi pe doŋ gimitogi pi tiŋo kema pa Rwot, kadi jami mo ma gitiyo kwede.”
Pi lok ma Daudi oloko me agikkine omiyo gicoyo wel Lulevi ma ditogi romo mwaka pyeraryo ki dok kwede malo.
En dok owacci, “Ticgi bibedo me konyo awobe pa Aron ka tic i ot pa Rwot, kun gigwoko dyekal ki kicika odi matinone, gilonyo jami maleŋ ducu, dok gitiyo kit tic mu kene ducu ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.

Dok ikonyo bene ki kela mugati ma giketo i nyim Rwot, ki moko kwon me gityer me moko kwon, ki capat mareppe ma tobi pe iye, ki gityer me moko kwon ma gitedo i otako nyonyo, ki gityer me moko kwon ma girubo ki moo, ki gin pimo pek ki dwoŋ pa jami mapatpat.
Gin gibicuŋ ka miyo pwoc ki pak bot Rwot odiko odiko, ki otyeno otyeno bene kumeno,
ki i kare ducu ma gityero gitum awaŋa bot Rwot i cen cabit, ki i por dwe, ki i nino maditogu, gibicuŋ i nyim Rwot kare ducu, kun gilubo wel jo ma giciko.
Gibigwoko kema me rwatte ki kabedo maleŋ kit meno, dok gibikonyo utmegigi, awobe pa Aron, i ticgi ma i ot pa Rwot.”
Dul pa likwayo pa Aron gin ene. Litino awobe pa Aron gin aye Nadab, Abiu, Eleajar ki Itamar.
Ento Nadab ki Abiu guto i kare ma wongi pud kwo, litinogi bene pe, mumi yo Eleajar ki Itamar gudoko ajwagi pa Lubaŋa.
Ci Daudi opokogi muporo dog ticgi ma giyerogi iye, kun jo ma gukonye gin aye Jadok ma i kin likwayo pa Eleajar, ki Akimelek ma i kin likwayo pa Itamar.

Doŋ macalo ginoŋo jo madito mapolle i kin likwayo pa Eleajar makato ma i kin likwayo pa Itamar, gupoko ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwarogi apar wiye abicel pi likwayo pa Eleajar, ki ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi aboro pi likwayo pa Itamar.
Gipokogi ki bolo kwir, marom, pien ludito me kabedo maleŋ ki ludito pa Lubaŋa yam gubedo i kin likwayo pa Eleajar ki i kin likwayo pa Itamar bene.

Cemaya wod pa Netanel ma Lalevi, ma obedo karan, yam ocoyo nyiŋgi ki i nyim kabaka, ki i nyim rwodi, ki ajwaka Jadok, ki Akimelek wod pa Abiatar, ki ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwaro pa ajwagi ki pa Lulevi; yam guyero dog ot pa kwarogi acel pi Eleajar ki acel giyero pi Itamar.
Kwir mukwoŋo opoto i kom Yekoyarib, ki me aryo i kom Jedaya,
me adek i kom Karim, me aŋwen i kom Ceorim,
me abic i kom Malkija, me abicel i kom Mijamin,
me abiro i kom Kakoj, me aboro i kom Abija,
me aboŋwen i kom Yecwa, me apar i kom Cekania,
me apar wiye acel i kom Eliacab, me apar wiye aryo i kom Jakim,
me apar wiye adek i kom Kupa, me apar wiye aŋwen i kom Jecebeab,
me apar wiye abic i kom Bilga, me apar wiye abicel i kom Imer,
me apar wiye abiro i kom Kejir, me apar wiye aboro i kom Kapijej,
me apar wiye aboŋwen i kom Petakia, me pyeraryo i kom Jekejikel,
me pyeraryo wiye acel i kom Jakin, me pyeraryo wiye aryo i kom Gamul,
me pyeraryo wiye adek i kom Delaya, me pyeraryo wiye aŋwen i kom Maajia.
Dog tic ma giyero jo magi iye obedo me donyo i ot pa Rwot, kun gilubo cik ma yam kwarogi Aron oketo pigi, macalo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael yam ociko en kwede.
Lok kom likwayo pa Levi mudoŋŋe: i kin likwayo pa Amram giyero Cubael; ki i kin likwayo pa Cubael giyero Jedeya.
Likwayo pa Rekabia: i kin likwayo pa Rekabia giyero Icia ma laditgi.
I kin likwayo pa Ijar giyero Celamot; i kin likwayo pa Celamotgiyero Jakat.
I kin likwayo pa Kebron giyero Jeria ma laditgi, me aryone Amajia, me adek Jakajiel, me aŋwen Jekameam.
I kin likwayo pa Ujiel giyero Mika; i kin likwayo pa Mika giyero Camir.
Omin Mika en aye Icia; i kin likwayo pa Icia giyero Jekaria.
I kin likwayo pa Merari giyero Makali ki Muci. I kin likwayo pa Jajia giyero Beno.
Likwayo pa Merari gin aye Jajia, Beno, Cokam, Jakur ki Ibri.
I kin likwayo pa Makali giyero Eleajar ma pe onywalo awobe.
I kin likwayo pa Kic giyero Jeramel.
I kin likwayo pa Muci giyero Makali, Eder ki Jerimot. Magi gin aye likwayo pa jo Levi, kun lubo dog odi pa kwarogi.

Jo magi bene, ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwarogi acel acel gubolo kwir, kun ladit bolo kacel ki utmegine matino, macalo utmegigi ma likwayo pa Aron gubolo ki i nyim kabaka Daudi, Jadok, Akimelek ki ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwaro pa ajwagi ki pa Lulevi.

Daudi ki ludito ma loyo tic gubolo tic ki jo mogo ma i kin likwayo pa Acap, pa Eman ki pa Jedutun, wek gutit lok pa Lubaŋa macalo lunebi ki opuk ki naŋa ki atego agoya-gu, Nyiŋ jo ma yam gitiyo tic man, ki dog ticgi gin ene:
i kin litino pa Acap, Jakur, Yucepu, Netania ki Acarela, ma litino pa Acap, Acap aye telogi i wer, kun tito lok ma a ki bot Lubaŋa, i te cik pa kabaka.
Litino pa Jedutun gin Gedalia, Jeri, Jecaya, Cimei, Kacabia ki Matitia, gin abicel, ma wongi Jedutun aye telogi i wer, kun tito lok a ma ki bot Lubaŋa ki opuk pi miyo pwoc bot Rwot.
Litino pa Eman gin Bukia, Matania, Ujiel, Cebuel, ki Jerimot, Anania, Kanani, Eliata, Gidalti, ki Romamtiejer, Jocebekaca, Maloti, Kotir ki Makajiot.
Magi ducu aye litino pa Eman ma lanen pa kabaka, macalo Lubaŋa yam ociko bote ni ebipilo wiye; pien Lubaŋa omiyo ki Eman litino awobe apar wiye aŋwen ki anyira adek.
Gin ducu yam wongi aye telogi i wer i ot pa Rwot, kun giwero ki atego agoya, naga ki opuk pi konyo lega ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, Acap, Jedutun ki Eman yam gitiyo i te loc pa kabaka.
Wei jo man giribo ki utmegigi ma yam gipwonyogi ki wer bot Rwot, jo ducu ma yam luryeko, giromo miya aryo ki pyeraboro wiye aboro.
Gin ducu gipokogi i dog tic kun gibolo kwir, kun jo matino ki jo madito, lupwony ki jo ma gipwonyogi, gitimogi ducu marom.
Kwir mukwoŋo opoto i kom Yucepu, ma jo pa Acap; me aryone opoto i kom Gedalia, ci okwako en ki omegine, ki litino awobene, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me adekke opoto i kom Jakur kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me aŋwenne opoto i kom Ijri kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me abicce opoto i kom Netania kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me abicelle opoto i kom Bukia kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me abirone opoto i kom Jecarela kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me aborone opoto i kom Jecaya kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me aboŋwenne opoto i kom Matania kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me aparre opoto i kom Cimei kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye acelle opoto i kom Ajarel kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye aryone opoto i kom Kacabia kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye adekke opoto i kom Cubael kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye aŋwenne opoto i kom Matitia kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye abicce opoto i kom Jeremot kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye abicelle opoto i kom Anania kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye abirone opoto i kom Jocebekaca kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye aborone opoto i kom Kanani kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me apar wiye aboŋwenne opoto i kom Maloti kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me pyeraryone opoto i kom Eliata kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me pyeraryo wiye acelle opoto i kom Kotir kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me pyeraryo wiye aryone opoto i kom Gidalti kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me pyeraryo wiye adekke opoto i kom Makajiot kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
me pyeraryo wiye aŋwenne opoto i kom Romamtiejer kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo.
Lok kom dul pa lugwokdoggola. I kin jo pa Kora guyero Mecelemia ma wod pa Kore ma i kin likwayo pa Acap.
Mecelemia onywalo awobe magi: Jekaria ma latin kayone, ka dok me aryone Jediael, me adekke Jebadia, me aŋwenne Jatiniel,
me abicce Elam, me abicelle Yekokanan, me abirone Eliekoenai.
Obed-edom onywalo awobe magi: Cemaya ma latin kayo, ka dok me aryone Yekojabad, me adekke Joa, me aŋwenne Cakar, me abicce Netanel,
me abicelle Amiel, me abirone Icakar, me aborone Peuletai; pien Lubaŋa omiye gum.
Ki wode Cemaya bene onywalo awobe ma gubedo rwodi i dog odi pa kwarogi, pien gubedo jo makwiri atika.
Litino awobe pa Cemaya gin aye Otini, Repael, Obed ki Eljabad, ma omegigi gubedo jo makwiri, nyiŋgi Eliu ki Cemakia.
Jo magi ducu gin aye likwayo pa Obed-edom kacel ki awobegi ki omegigi, jo makwiri ma giromo tic; jo pa Obed-edom giromo pyerabicel wiye aryo.
Mecelemia bene obedo ki awo bene ki omegine ma gikwiri, gin apar wiye aboro.
Ki Koca ma i kin likwayo pa Merari onywalo awobe magi: Cimri aye laditgi; kadi pe en aye latin kayo, ento wonne okero en odoko ladit;
ka dok me aryone Ilkia, me adekke Tebalia, me aŋwenne Jekaria; awobe pa Koca kacel ki omegine, ducu giromo apar wiye adek.
Dul magi pa lugwok-doggola, ma dul acel acel tye ki laditte, gipokogi tic, kit ma yam gipoko ki utmegigi bene ma gubedo ka tic i ot pa Rwot;
dok gibolo kwir ma lubo dog odi pa kwarogi, pi noŋo doggola ma gibigwoko, kun dog odi matino ki maditone gitimogi marom.
Kwir ma gibolo pi doggola ma tuŋ wokceŋ opoto i kom Celemia. Gibolo kwir bene pi wode Jekaria, ma en lami-tam ma ŋeyo piny mada, ci mere opoto pi doggola ma tuŋ acam.
Pa Obed-edom opoto pi doggola ma tuŋ acuc, ci pa awobene obedo ot kano jami.
Pa Cupim ki Koca opoto pi doggola ma tuŋ potoceŋ, kacel ki doggola ma gilwoŋo Caleket ma i yo ma dok tuŋ malo. Lugwok-doggola gukemme ki luwotgi.
Ki tuŋ wokceŋ gubedo jo abicel i nino acel acel, ki tuŋ acam jo aŋwen i nino acel acel, ki tuŋ acuc bene jo aŋwen i nino acel acel, kacel ki jo aryo aryo i ot kano jami.
I ot ma tere aperu ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ onoŋo giketo jo aŋwen i ŋet yo, ki aryo i ŋet ot ma tere aperu.
Magi aye dul pa lugwok-doggola ma i kin jo pa Kora ki likwayo pa Merari.
I kin Lulevi giketo Akija obedo ladit ma gwoko odi me kano lim ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, ki odi me kano lim me mot ma gidyero bot Rwot.
I kin likwayo pa Gercon likwayo pa Ladan aye gubedo ludito kaka i dog odi pa kwarogi. Laditgi aye Jekieli.
Litino awobe pa Jekieli, ma gin aye Jetam ki ominne Joel, gubedo ludito ma gwoko odi me kano lim ma i ot pa Rwot.
I kin jo pa Amram, pa Ijar, pa Kebron ki pa Ujiel.
Cebuel, ma lakwar Gercom ma wod pa Moses, en aye rwot madit ma giketo pi gwoko odi me kano limo
Omegine gin ene: i kin likwayo pa Eliejer obedo wode Rekabia, ma wode Jecaya, ma wode Joram, ma wode Jikri, ma wode Celomot.

Celomot man ki omegine gubedo ludito ma gwoko odi me kano mot ducu ma yam kabaka Daudi odyero bot Rwot, ki mot ma ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi ki ludito ma giloyo buca mony me jo alip, ki buca mony me jo miya, ki lutel wi mony yam gudyero bene.
Gin yam gudyero mot mua i lim ma giyako i lweny me yubo ot pa Rwot.
Dok bene lim ducu ma yam Camuel ma lanen-piny, ki Caulo wod pa Kic, ki Abneri wod pa Ner, ki Joab, wod pa Jeruya yam gudyero bot Rwot; mot ducu ma gidyero Celomot ki omegine gubedo ka gwokone.
I kom jo pa Ijar, giketo Kanania ki awobene pi tic ma woko ma i Icrael me bedo jagi ki luŋolkop.
I kom jo pa Kebron giketo Kacabia ki omegine ma gikwiri ma romo alip acel ki miya abiro me ne no tic ma i Icrael ma loka Jordan yo tuŋ potoceŋ, pi tic pa Rwot ducu ki pi tic pa kabaka bene.

I kom jo pa Kebron laditgi obedo Jerija ma loyo jo pa Kebron ducu ma ocoko dog odi pa kwarogi ducu. I mwaka me pyeraŋwen me loc pa Daudi yam gibedo ka yenyo, ci ginoŋo jo makwiri atika ma i kingi i Jajer ma i Gilead.

Kabaka Daudi oketo en ki omegine, jo makwiri ma romo alip aryo ki miya abiro, ma gin ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi, me neno tic pa jo pa Reuben, jo pa Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace pi lok ducu ma mako tic pa Lubaŋa ki pi lok pa kabaka.

Man aye nyiŋ jo Icrael ma ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi, ludito ma giloyo buca mony pa jo alip ki buca mony pa jo miya, ki luditogi ma yam gitiyo bot kabaka i kom lok ducu ma mako dul pa jo ma gibino ki ma gicito dwe ki dwe pi mwaka ducu, kun dul acel acel welle romo jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen:
Jacobeam ma wod pa Jabdiel en aye ladit ma loyo dul mukwono ma tiyo i dwe mukwono; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
En yam lakwar Perej, en yam ladit ma loyo luwi mony ducu pa mony ma gitiyo i dwe mukwoŋo.
Dodai ma jo Akoki aye ladit ma loyo jo ma tiyo i dwe me aryo; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Ladit me adekke, ma loyo jo ma tiyo i dwe me adek, en aye Benaya wod pa ajwaka Yekoyada, en aye laditgi; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Benaya man en aye twon oteka ma i kin jo pyeradek ca, dok en aye ma loyo jo pyeradek-ku; wode Amijabad aye ladit ma loyo lwak ma i dulle.
Me aŋwenne obedo Acael ma omin Joab, pi dwe me aŋwen; ŋat ma olube obedo Jebadia ma wode. I dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Ladit me abicce, pi dwe me abic, en aye Camkut ma jo pa Ijra; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Me abicelle pi dwe me abicel en aye Ira ma wod pa Ikec ma jo Tekoa; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Me abirone, pi dwe me abiro, en aye Kelej ma jo Pelon, ma i kin likwayo pa Epraim; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Me aborone, pi dwe me aboro, en aye Cibekai ma jo Kueat, pa jo pa Jera; i dulle tye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Me aboŋwenne, pi dwe me aboŋwen, en aye Abiejer ma jo Anatot, ma Labenjamin; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Me aparre, pi dwe me apar, en aye Makarai ma jo Netopa, ma jo Jera; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Me apar wiye acelle, pi dwe me apar wiye acel, en aye Benaya ma jo Piraton, ma i kin likwayo pa Epraim; i dulle tye i iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Me apar wiye aryone, pi dwe me apar wiye aryo, en aye Keldai ma jo Netopa, likwayo pa Otiniel; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Jo ma loyo kaka pa Icrael gin ene: ladit ma loyo jo pa Reuben en aye Eliejer ma wod, pa Jikri; pi jo pa Cimeon, Cepatia ma wod pa Maaka;
pi jo pa Levi, en Kacabia ma wod pa Kamuel; pi jo pa Aron, Jadok;
pi jo pa Juda, Eliu, ma ŋat acel ma i kin omegi Daudi; pi jo pa Icakar, Omri ma wod pa Mikael;
pi jo pa Jabulon, Icmaya ma wod pa Obadia; pi jo pa Naputali, Jeremot ma wod pa Ajriel;
pi jo pa Epraim, Kocea ma wod pa Ajajia; pi nucu kaka pa Manace, Joel ma wod pa Pedaya;
pi nucu kaka pa Manace ma i Gilead, Iddo ma wod pa Jekaria; pi jo pa Benjamin, Jaciel ma wod pa Abneri;
pi jo pa Dan, Ajarel ma wod pa Jerokam. Magi aye ludito ma loyo kaka ducu ma i Icrael.
Daudi yam pe okwano wel jo ma mwaka me ditogi pe romo pyeraryo, pien Rwot yam ociko ni ebimiyo jo Icrael gibedo mapol macalo lwak lakalatwe me polo.
Joab ma wod pa Jeruya yam ocako kwano welgi ento pe ocobo; kadi bed kumeno akemo opoto i kom Icrael pi roc man, welgi bene pe gicoyo i buk me tekwaro pa kabaka Daudi.
Ŋat ma loyo odi me kano lim pa kabaka en aye Ajimavet ma wod pa Adiel; ki ma loyo odi lim ma i lobo, ma i gaŋi madito ki matinone, ki i odi matego ma ocudo malo liŋ aye Yonacan ma wod pa Ujia;
ki ma loyo jo ma gitiyo tic me pur i poto en aye Ejiri ma wod pa Kelub;
ki ma loyo poto olok en aye Cimei ma jo Rama; ki ma loyo gin ma ocek i poto olok ma gikano i odi me kano kono yino en aye Jabdi ma jo Cipmi.
Ŋat ma loyo yadi jeituni ki olam ma i bar Cepela en aye Baal-kanan ma jo Geder, dok ŋat ma loyo ot kano moo jeituni en aye Yoaci.
Ŋat ma loyo lwak dyaŋi ma gikwayogi i Caron aye Citrai ma jo Caron; ki ma loyo lwak dyaŋi ma i nota ducu aye Capat ma wod pa Adlai.
Ŋat ma loyo kinaga aye Obil ma jo Icmael; ki, ma loyo megi kana aye Jedeya ma jo Meronot. Ŋat ma loyo romi ki dyegi aye Jajij ma jo Agri.
Jo magi ducu gin lugwok-lim pa kabaka Daudi.
Yonacan ma okeyo Daudi aye lami-tam, pien obedo dano ma niaŋ matut, dok karan bene; en ki Jekiel ma wod pa Kakmoni gubedo lugwok litino awobe pa kabaka.
Akitopel obedo lami-tam pa kabaka, ki Kucai ma jo Arki obedo larem kabaka.
Jo ma guleyo ka tyen Akitopel aye Yekoyada ma wod pa Benaya, ki Abiatar. Joab aye ladit me mony pa kabaka.

Daudi ocoko ludito pa jo Icrael ducu i Jerucalem, ludito ma loyo kaka ducu, ludito ma loyo dul tic ducu ma gitiyo i te loc pa kabaka, ludito ma loyo buca mony me jo alip, ki buca mony me jo miya, ludito ma gwoko jami ducu ki lim makwo ducu pa kabaka ki pa awo bene, kacel ki ludito ma loyo gaŋ kai, ki jo ma twoni oteka, ki jo ducu ma gunyebbe ki lweny.

Ci kabaka Daudi oa malo, ocuŋ, ocako waco ni, “Wuwiny an, wun utmega ki wun lwakka. Yam abedo ki tam i cwinya me gero ot ka ma canduk me gicikke pa Rwot biywe iye, ki ka ma gibiketo iye kom pa Lubaŋa me teno tyene; ci abedo ka yubo kit me gerone ducu.
Ento Lubaŋa ojuka kun wacca ni. ‘In pe ibigero ot mo pi nyina, pien in lalweny, dok ityeko oyo lwak remo madwoŋ.’

Kadi bed kumeno, ci Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael yam oyero an ki i kin doggola pa kwarina ducu me bedo kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael matwal; pien yam oyero Juda wek obed ladit, ki i ot pa Juda oyero ot pa wora, ki i kin litino awobe pa wora cwinye okwanyo an me bedo kabaka ma loyo Icrael ducu.
I kom litino awobena ducu, macalo Lubaŋa omiya litino awobe mapol, en oyero iye woda Solomon me bedo i wi komker ma i te ker pa Rwot ma loyo Icrael.
En rwacca ni, ‘Wodi Solomon aye bigerra ot ki dye kalle ducu, pien ayero en wek obed woda, ki an bene abibedo wonne.
Abimoko kerre bedo matwal, ka ce cwinye omoko matek me lubo cikka ki lok ma aŋolo ducu kit ma en tye kwede i kare-ni.’

Doŋ acikowu i nyim jo Icrael ducu, ki i nyim lwak pa Rwot ducu, ma kun Lubaŋa bene winyo, wun wubed ka gwoko ki ka yenyo cik pa Rwot Lubaŋawu ducu, wek wubed wegi lobo man maber-ri, ci wuwek obed ginaleya matwal bot likwayowu ma gibilubo ŋewu.

“In woda Solomon bene, ber iŋe Lubaŋa pa wora, iti ki en ki cwinyi ducu ki kero komi ducu; pien Rwot ŋiyo cwiny dano ducu, dok ŋeyo gin ma cwiny dano yubo ducu ki tamme ducu. Ka ce iyenyo en, ci in ibinoŋo kome; ento ka ce ibwoto en woko, en bitenyi woko matwal.
Ber igwokke matek, pien Rwot doŋ otyeko yero in pi gero ot me kabedo maleŋ; bed laco, wek itim woko.”

Ci Daudi omiyo bot wode Solomon cal kicika ot me donyo i ot pa Lubaŋa ma yam gicoyo, ki cal odine ducu, ki cal odi kano lim, ki me kicika ma malo ducu, ki me kicika odi matino ducu ma i iye, ki me kicika ma kom me kica bedo iye.

Dok omiye cal ma nyuto dyekal me ot pa Rwot ducu kit ma yam cwinye otamo, ki kicika odi matino ma orumo ot ducu, ki odi me kano lim ducu ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, ki odi me kano lim me mot ma gidyero bot Rwot.
Onyutte bene dul tic pa ajwagi ki Lulevi, ki kit kwa tic ducu ma gitiyo i ot pa Rwot; ki kit kwa jami ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Rwot,
ki pek pa jabu ma mitte pi jami me jabu ma i dog tic acel acel, ki pek pa jami me ryal pi dog tic acel acel,

ki pek pa okar-mac me jabu, ki mac laputgi, pek me jabu ma mitte pi okar-mac acel acel ki lwak laputte ducu, ki pek pa ryal ma mitte pi okar-mac acel acel ki lwak laputte ducu, muporo kit tic pa okarmac acel acel ma gitiyo kwede,
ki pek me jabu ma mitte pi meja acel acel me mugati me aketa i nyim Rwot, ki pek me ryal ma mitte pi tiyo meja me ryal ducu,
ki jabu ma giliyo maberre pi gin lacob riŋo, ki becen ducu, ki kikopo ducu; dok pi atabo jabu ducu, ki pekgi acel acel; pi atabo ryal ducu ki pekgi acel acel;
ki pi keno tyer me wano odok eceta ma gitiyo ki jabu ma giliyo maleŋŋe, ki pekke. Ka doki onyutte cal gadigadi mejabu pa lukerubi ma giyaro bwomgi me umo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot.
Man ducu en onyuto ka maleŋ pi gin ma yam Rwot ocoyo pire ki ciŋe: tic ducu myero giti ma lubo kit cal meno.

Daudi dok owaco bot wode Solomon ni, “Bed laco ma cwinyi nwaŋ, wek itim woko. Pe ilwor, pe cwinyi oryaŋŋe: pien Rwot Lubaŋa, ma en aye Lubaŋana, tye kwedi. En pe bibwoti ata, dok pe bitenyi, nio ka tic ducu ma gitiyo i ot pa Rwot bitum.

Nen, it ye ki lwak dul pa ajwagi ki pa Lulevi pi tiyo tic ducu me ot pa Lubaŋa; jo ducu ma ludiro i kwa tic ducu, ma gitye ki miti, gibinywako tic kwedi; ki ludito ki lwak ducu gibiwinyo dogi i lok ducu.”

Pienno doŋ atyeko yubo jami ducu pi ot pa Lubaŋana kit munoŋo atwero, jabu pi jami me jabu, ryal pi jami me ryal, mola pi jami me mola, nyonyo pi jami me nyonyo, bao pi jami me bao, kun amedo iye lwak kidi onik mapol mada, ki litino kidi me amwona i kom jabu, ki akuku-gu, ki godi ma raŋigi patpat, godi me wei ma kitgi patpat, ki kidi matarre bene.
Dok pien cwinya obedo yom i kom ot pa Lubaŋana, omiyo amiyo jami magi me jabu ki me ryal mua i ciŋa pi ot pa Lubaŋana, kun amedo i kom lwak jami ducu ma atyeko yubo pi ot maleŋ,
gin ene: jabu ma pekke romo talanta adek, en aye jabu me Opir, ki ryal ma giliyo maleŋŋe ma pekke romo talanta alip abiro pi mwono kom ot pa Rwot,
ki pi tic ducu ma ludiro gibitiyo, jabu pi jami me jabu, ki ryal pi jami me ryal. Aŋa ma bikelo jami ma cwinye opwoyo-ni, ma tin kwerre kene i nyim Rwot?”

Ci ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarigi gucako tyero mot ma igi opwoyo, ki ludito ma loyo kaka bene gumiyo kit meno, ki ludito ma loyo buca mony me jo alip ki buca mony jo miya, ki ludito ma loyo tic pa kabaka.

Gumiyo jami magi pi tic me ot pa Lubaŋa: jabu ma romo talanta alip abic ki darik alip apar, ki ryal ma romo talanta alip apar, ki mola ma romo talanta alip aboro, ki nyonyo ma romo talanta alip miya acel.
Ki ŋat ma tye ki godi me wei omiyogi i ot kano lim ma i ot pa Rwot, ma Jekiel ma jo pa Gercon aye gwoko.
Cwiny lwak obedo yom pien jo magi gumiyo mot ma cwinygi opwoyo, pien gutyero mot bot Rwot ki cwinygi ducu. Kabaka Daudi bene cwinye obedo yom matek.
Mumiyo Daudi opwoyo Rwot i nyim lwak mucokke ducu, kun wacci, “Gipwo in Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowa Icrael, nino ma pe tum.
Ai Rwot, dit ki tek ki deyo ki loc ki woro ducu meri, pien jami ducu ma tye i polo ki ma tye i lobo ducu meri. Ker bene meri, ai Rwot, in gipilo wii pien iloyo jami ducu.
Lonyo ki deyo ducu a ki boti, dok in aye iloyogi ducu. Twero ki tek ducu tye i ciŋi, dok ciŋi aye miyo dano dit dok miyo tek ki jo ducu.
Wan doŋ wapwoyi, in Lubaŋawa, kun wapako nyiŋi me deyo matek.
“Ento an aŋa, ki lwakka kono gin aŋo, niumiyo wabedo ki twero kit man me miyo jamiwa kit ma iwa opwoyo-ni? Pien jami ducu a ki boti, dok wadwokki giri.
Pien wan wawelo i nyimi, ki lubedo, kit ma yam kwarowa tye kwede; ninowa me bedo i lobo Lokke calo tipo, kabedowa pe iye.
Ai Rwot Lubaŋawa, lwak jami man ducu ma wamiyo pi gerri ot pi nyiŋi maleŋ gua ki i ciŋi, ducu jamini giri.

An aŋeyo, ai Lubaŋana, in itemo cwiny dano, ipwoyo dano ma cwinye atir; pi cwinya ma tye atir omiya atyero boti mot me jami magi ducu; doŋ atyeko neno lwakki ki waŋa, gin ma gitye kany-nyi, ka gityero jamigi boti kit ma cwinygi omito ki yomcwiny madwoŋ.
Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowa Abraim ki Icaka ki Icrael, mi cwiny lwakki okem tam ma kit ennu nakanaka, dok imi cwinygi okem boti keken.
Dok mi bot woda Solomon gum me mako cikki ki cwinye ducu, ki lok ma ibolo, ki lok ma iciko-gu, kun cobogi ducu; kun imiye gum me gero gaŋ kal ma doŋ atyeko yubo jami pire-ni.”
Lacen Daudi owaco bot lwak ducu mucokke ni, “Wupwo Rwot Lubaŋawu.” Lwak mucokke ducu gucako pwoyo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarigi, ci gukulo wigi piny, guworo Rwot, dok gumiyo woro bot kabaka bene.

Gutumo gitum bot Rwot, dok orwone bene gutyero gitum awaŋa bot Rwot, twoni alip acel, nyogi romi alip acel ki litino romi alip acel, kacel ki gityer amata ma otiko kit gityer acel acel, ki lwak gitum mukene mapol pi jo Icrael ducu.
Gucamo dok gumato i nyim Rwot i nino meno ki yomcwiny madwoŋ twatwal.
Guketo Solomon wod pa Daudi me bedo kabaka tyen me aryone, kun giwire ki moo me bedo laker pi Rwot, dok giwiro Jadok bene me bedo ajwaka pa Lubaŋa.
Lacen Solomon obedo kabaka i wi komker pa Rwot ma ka wonne Daudi; ci obedo ki gumkom, kun jo Icrael giworo doge.
Ci ludito ducu ki twoni oteka lweny ducu, kacel ki litino awobe pa kabaka Daudi ducu, gucikke pi woro kabaka Solomon.
Ci Lubaŋa omiyo Solomon yweka madit i nyim jo Icrael ducu, ci ocako onyo deyo me loc i kome madwoŋ ma yam pe onen i kom kabaka me Icrael mo nia wa con.
Daudi wod pa Yece yam oloyo Icrael ducu kit meno.
Obedo ka loyo jo Icrael pi mwaka pyeraŋwen kulu; obedo ka loc i Kebron pi mwaka abiro, ka dok i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeradek wiye adek.
Daudi oto ma doŋ oti woko likoŋ, i kare maber mupoŋ ki lonyo ki deyo; ci wode Solomon oleyo ka tyene.
Lok kom kabaka Daudi ducu nia i acakkine nio i agikkine gicoyogi i buk me Tekwaro pa Camuel ma lanen ki i buk me Tekwaro pa lanebi Natan, ki i buk me Tekwaro pa Gad ma lanen,
kacel ki lok kom locce ducu, ki tekke ducu, ki lok ducu ma otimme i kome, ki i kom Icrael ki i kom ker ducu ma i lobo.
Solomon wod pa Daudi omoko kerre matek, kun Rwot Lubaŋane bene onoŋo tye kwede, ma omiyo en obedo madit twatwal.
Solomon oloko ki jo Icrael ducu, bot ludito ma loyo buca mony me jo alip ki buca mony me jo miya, ki bot luŋokop ki ludito ducu ma i Icrael ducu, ma gin aye ludito wi kaka ki i odi pa kwarogi ducu.
Solomon kacel ki lwak mucokke ducu gucito I kabedo me woro Lubaŋa i wi got ma i Gibeon; pien kema me rwatte pa Lubaŋa, ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot otiyo ki i tim, onoŋo pud bedo kunnu.
(Ento Daudi yam okwanyo canduk pa Lubaŋa ki i Kiriat-jearim, okelo i kabedo ma ceŋ en oyubo pire, pien onoŋo oguro kema pire i Jerucalem,)
Onoŋo keno mola ma yam Bejalel wod pa Un, ma wod pa Kur otiyo-ni, pud tye wa kunnu bene i nyim kema pa Rwot.
Solomon ocito cok ki keno mola ma i nyim kema me rwatte, wa i nyim Rwot, ci otyero iye gitum awaŋa alip acel kulu.
I dyewor meno Lubaŋa onen Iye bot Solomon, owacce ni, “Peny gin ma abimiyo boti.”
Solomon ogamo doŋ Lubaŋa ni, “In yam myuto mar meri madwoŋ ma pe lokke bot wora Daudi, dok iketo an adoko kabaka pi leyo ka Tyene.
Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, wek lok ma yam iciko bot wora Daudi tin doŋ ocobbe kakare, pien iketo an adoko kabaka me loyo rok madit ma gipol ma rom ki apwa me ŋom.
Ber tin imiya ryeko ki ŋeyo piny, wek aŋe kit me loyo rok man, pien aŋa ma twero loyo lwakki man, madwoŋ ma rom manni?”

Lubaŋa ogamo dog Solomon ni, “Ka meno aye gin ma tye i cwinyi, macalo in pe ilego lim nyo lonyo nyo deyo, kadi pi jo ma gidagi ni myero ginekgi woko, pe bene ilega, ni ami iri wi lobo nakanaka, ento ilego ryeko ki ŋeyo piny piri keni, wek ilo lwakka ma aketo in ibedo kabakagi,

ryeko ki ŋeyo piny doŋ amiyogi boti. Dok abimiyi lwak lonyo ki lim ki deyo, ma pe tye ŋat acel mo i kin luker ma gukwoŋo nyimi ma yam olimo gin ma rom meno, kadi wa kabaka mo ma bilubo kori pe bilimo kumeno.”
Solomon ocako a woko ki i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi got ma tye i Gibeon, kun oa woko ki i nyim kema me rwatte, odok i Jerucalem, ci obedo ka loyo jo Icrael.
Kabaka Solomon yam omiyo ryal odoko gin ma lam ma rom ki gweŋ-gu i Jerucalem, dok okelo yadi cedar mapol ata ma rom ki olam ma i bar Cepela.
En yam limo aguragura ma a ki i Ejipt ki Kuc; lucat-wil pa kabaka gamogi ki i Kuc i wel lim ma onoŋo giyubo.

Gadigadi ma gia ki i Ejipt welgi onoŋo romo cekel me ryal miya abicel, ki aguragura acel welle cekel miya acel ki pyerabic; ka dok lucat-wil pa kabaka catogi bot luker ducu pa jo Kit, ki bot luker me Ciria.
Solomon otamo pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa pi nyiŋ Rwot, kacel ki gaŋ kalle kikome.
Solomon oyero jo alip pyerabiro me yweko yec, ki jo alip pyeraboro me muko godi i lobo ma obedo gotgot, ki jo alip adek ki miya abicel me bedo ludito ma loyo lutic.
Solomon dok ocwalo lok bot Kuram kabaka me Turo ni, “Kit ma yam ibedo ki wora Daudi kun icwalle bao cedar me gero ode me bedone, ber ibed kweda bene kit meno.

Nen, ayubbe pi gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋana, ci abidyero bote pi waŋo iye odok eceta ma ŋwece kur i nyime, ki pi tyero iye mugati me gitum awaŋa odiko ki otyeno, ki i ceŋ cabit ducu, ki i por dwe, ki i nino madito ma Rwot Lubaŋawa oketo, ma yam en ociko pi jo Icrael matwal.
Ot ma abigero-ni bibedo dit mada, pien Lubaŋawa du makato lubaŋa mukenegu ducu.

Ento aŋa ma twero gero ot pi Lubaŋa? Kadi polo kulu ma tye malo twal-li, pe twero romo en bedo iye. An kono an aŋa ma atwero gero ot pire? Ento kono atwero tiyo ot mo macalo kabedo me waŋo odok eceta i nyime keken.

Pienno amito icwalla dano mo makwiri ma twero tic i kom jabu, ki ryal, ki mola, ki nyonyo, ki boŋo ma lamar lamar, ki makwar ki ma bulu, ki dano ma gipwonyo ki goro kom jami, wek oti ki lutic makwiri ma gitye kweda i Juda ki i Jerucalem, ma yam wora Daudi oyubogi.
Dok icwalla bao cedar, ki ciprec, ki bao algum ma gia i Lebanon, pien aŋeyo ni luticci giŋeyo toŋo yadi ma i Lebanon. Dok luticca gibibedo ki luticci,
wek guyubba bao madwoŋ, pien ot ma abigero-ni bibedo dit dok me aura.

Abimiyo bot joni ma gitiŋo bao ŋano ma nyige ma romo guniya alip pyerabicel, ki cayiri ma romo guniya alip pyerabicel, ki koŋo vino ma romo debe alip pyeraŋwen, ki moo jeituni bene debe alip pyeraŋwen, obed pi luticci me acamagi.”
Kuram kabaka me Turo odok iye ki waraga ma ocwalo bot Solomon ni, “Pien Rwot maro jone omiyo oketo in ibedo kabaka ma loyogi.”
Kuram dok owacci, “Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma con otiyo polo ki lobo, ma omiyo ki Daudi wode maryek, ma tye ki niaŋ matut, ma bigero ot pi Rwot, kacel ki gaŋ kalle kikome.
“An doŋ acwalli dano ma ladiro ma tye ki ŋec matut, en Kuram-abi,

ma wod pa dako ma anyira Dan, ma wonne dano me Turo, Gipwonyo en ki tic i kom jabu, ki ryal, ki mola, ki nyonyo ki godi, ki bao, ki boŋo ma lamar lamar, ki ma bulu ki makwar ki camanini maberre, En ŋeyo bene tic ducu me goro coc i kom jami, ŋeyo lubo kit cal mo me tic ma gimiye, kun tiyo kacel ki ludironi, ki ludiro pa rwoda Daudi ma woru.
Pienno gin ma rwoda owaco-ni, doŋ ocwal ki luticce, ŋano ki cayiri, ki moo ki koŋo vino;
Ci wan wabitoŋo kit bao ducu ma imito ki i Lebanon, wabitweyogi ci gibikwan i wi pii macalo bwoda nio wa i Jopa, wek in doŋ iom iter i Jerucalem.”
Solomon dok ocako kwano wel jo ducu me rok mukene ma gibedo i lobo Icrael, kit ma yam wonne Daudi koŋ okwanogi-ni. Ginoŋo ni welgi romo jo alip miya acel ki pyerabic wiye adek ki miya abicel.

En oyero jo alip pyerabiro ki i kingi me yweko yec ducu, ki jo alip pyeraboro me muko godi i lobo ma obedo gotgot, ki jo alip adek ki miya abicel me bedo ludito ma loyo lutic, pi cuko cwiny dano wek guti tic.
En ocako gerone i dwe me aryo i mwaka me aŋwen me locce.
Solomon opimo ot pa Lubaŋa ma en omito gerone-ni kit man: borre romo futi pyeraboŋwen, ki lacce futi pyeradek.

Ki kicika ma i doggola me donyo ma i nyim kicika me ot lacce romo futi pyeradek, ma roni ki lac me ot maditte; borre tuŋ malo roma futi miya acel ki pyeraboro. Omwono iye woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber.
Solomon oguro kor ot me kicika maditte ki bao ciprec, ci omwono kom bao woko ki jabu maberre, ma gigoro iye cal yadi otit ki nyor.
Odeyo i ot mamwonya mada ki godi matino me wel ma gimwono i kom jabu. Jabune obedo jabu ma gikelo ki i Parvaim.
Kit meno en omwono i ot ducu ki jabu, riine, rii doggolane, kor kicika ot ducu, ki doggolane; ka dok ogoro cal lukerubi i kor kicika ot.
Pek me mucumar me jabu ma giguro kwede obedo cekel pyerabic. En dok omwono kicika ma malo ducu ki jabu.

Bwom lukerubi ducu borre muyarre romo futi pyeradek. Bwomgi acel acel borre romo futi abiro ki nucu. Wi bwom lakerubi acel ogudo kor ot, kun bwome tuŋcel ma borre futi abiro ki nucu, wiye ogudo wi bwom lakerubi wadi;
ki bwom lakerubi man bwome acel ma borre futi abiro ki nucu-ni, wiye bene ogudo kicika ot, ki bwome mukene, ma romo futi abiro ki nucu-ni, wiye orwatte ki bwom lakerubi mukwoŋo-ni.
Bwom cal lukerubi magi borgi muyarre oromo futi pyeradek. Gucuŋ ki tyengi ma gineno tuŋ kicika ot maditte.
Okwoyo boŋo kicika ki boŋo ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwarre, ki boŋo camanini maberre, ma odero ki callukerubi.
En dok otiyo wir aryo ma bocogi romo futi pyerabic wiye aryo, ki lalukana i wigi ma bocogi romo futi abiro ki nucu, ci oketogi i nyim ot.
Ka dok otiyo nyor macalo tiko ŋut, ci oketogi i wi wir aryo ducu, ka dok otimo cal nyig okwer pomegranat miya acel, ci oketogi i kom nyor.
Ocibo wir magi i nyim ot pa Lubaŋa, acel yo tuŋ acuc, ki mukene yo tuŋ acam. Ocako nyiŋ ma yo tuŋ acuc-ci ni, Jakin, ki ma yo tuŋ acam-mi olwoŋo ni Boaj.

Ka dok otiyo nam me mola ma giliyo ma otwodde aduno, ma lacce romo futi apar wiye abic, nia i doge tuŋcel nio i doge tuŋcel; borre tuŋ malo romo futi abiro ki nucu. Gipimo doge ki tol ci oromo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
Ki i tere piny tye iye cal keno munyak ma orumo kom nam ducu, ma borre futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic; cal keno magi giryeyogi latyeŋ aryo, I kare ma gitiyo nam, gitiyo ki cal keno i kome lawanace!.

Gicibo nam ocuŋ i wi cal twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo; giketo adek gineno yo tuŋ acam, adek gineno yo tuŋ potoceŋ, adek gineno yo tuŋ acuc, ki adek gineno yo tuŋ wokceŋ. Gicibo nam ocun i ŋe twoni-nu, kun ŋegi ducu odok tuŋ iye.
Kome kinoŋ maromo incic adek; ki doge bene calo dog kikopo, ma, rom ki cal ature leŋa, Piine romo debe makato alip abicel.
Ka dok otiyo otako apar me lwok, oketo abic yo tuŋ acuc, ki abic yo tuŋ acam. Magi obedo me lako jami ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi pi gitum awaŋa: nam giketo me lwok pa ajwagi.
En dok otiyo meja apar, oketogi i ot pa Lubaŋa, abic yo tuŋ acuc ki abic yo tuŋ acam. Dok otiyo becen me jabu miya acel.
Ka dok oyubo dyekal pa ajwagi, ki dyekal maditte, ki kika me dyekal, omwono kom ki ka ducu ki mola;
ka oketo nam i twok ot i kin tuŋ acuc ki tuŋ wokceŋ.
Kuram ocweyo agulu mapol bene, ki akwaya, ki becen-gu, Kit meno Kuram otyeko tic i kom ot pa Lubaŋa pi kabaka Solomon.
Otiyo wir aryo, ki lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe macalo agulu ma giketo i wi wir, ki obwo aryo me umo kom lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe ma obedo i wi wir-ri.
